SWITCH OFF AND APOLOGISE TO NO ONE!

At Work
column4:
>

 

The world's most progressive companies understand the impact of corporate wellness. Nap rooms will become the norm. Get the edge at work and increase your output. 

For Meditation
column6:
>

 

Wait until you experience the sound of monastery chants or the atmosphere of calming rain in Silentmode. This is a game-changing way to switch off your mind and meditate easily.

When Travelling
column8:
>

 

You've just been upgraded! Take the pain out of traveling and block out those annoying disturbances. Rest efficiently and feel refreshed at your destination and ready to go!
column11:
>

 

Recovery Mask

We have spent years on this journey and 24 months specifically designing, building, testing and preparing the ultimate relaxation mask for launch. Shut down your visual senses with this high-quality audio device and master the power of breathwork.
column13:
>

 

Ensuring that you block all visual distractions is vital to calming down the brain. The Silentmode napping mask is 100% black-out with sockets that allow your eyes the freedom to move ensuring REM sleep can occur.
column14:
>

 

Our patent-pending design allows easy packing and transport as well as unrivaled comfort. Highest quality memory foams enable you can lay down comfortably in any position and maintain Silentmode.
column15:
>

 

A combination of soft-goods integrated with high quality bespoke audio drivers. Get comfortable and switch off with Breathonics nap music or play your own sounds on Spotify or any other music app

Our patent-pending design allows you to customise each speaker placement ensuring you receive the highest quality experience possible.
column17:
'/>

Super Sonic Sound

We have partnered with leading audio providers to deliver the best sound experience possible. We've built our custom tuned hardware to deliver immersive frequencies and our proprietary napping music Breathonics.
column18:
>

                                        

 

Breathing correctly is the first step towards awesome rest. By clearing the mind and controlling one’s breath it is possible to master the thoughts that flow around your head and keep you up at night, but it takes practice. Once you are able to clear your mind, your body will follow suit and awesome naps will become easier to obtain. This is all part of managing your sleep logistics.

Watch the video below to find out more.
column20:
showinfo=0"">

 

Practice clearing your mind and relaxing your body with beautiful, immersive, musical experiences.

 

 

Ready to find your Nappiness?

 

Naps can be used as a natural solution to stress and help you improve your productivity. If you are new to napping, we can help you practice and find your ideal napping routine.

 

 

Sleep Logistics  

Our job at Silentmode is to develop our Napinness algorithm in order to tell you when it's the best time for you to take the perfect nap. We do this using a combination of data points from sleeping hours, wake up times and desired outcomes.

Why are we doing this?

Stress and sleep deprivation, the silent killer.

Life is no fun when you’re constantly bogged down with stress and anxiety. And here’s what makes it even worse: When your body doesn’t get the rest it needs, your stress and anxiety are not only compounded, but your body doesn’t have the mental strength to fight it off.

You can fight back!

No matter what’s causing your stress or anxiety, it can be improved with sleep. That’s a fact. Better sleep gives you more energy, helps you focus, resets your mind, and reinvigorates your body. All of these benefits are proven to decrease stress and improve your well-being.

The finer points

We are currently shipping to

USA, Canada, European Union, United Kingdom, Australia, Hong Kong, South Korea and Japan.

Please note that you will be responsible for duties, fees, and taxes applicable to your region, which can range from 0% to 20% in EU countries.

Not shipping to your country?

Please email info@silentmode.com

Need help? We're here for you 

If you have questions at any time, during or after the campaign has closed, you can always reach us at info@silentmode.com 

THANK YOU NAPPERS!

Shapeheart is the most convenient system ever created to exercise with your smartphone. Our durable armband offers:
<li>
a smoother running experience with a magnetic phone case that lets you easily access your apps while running
<li>
smarter training with accurate heart rate measurement that lets you personalize your sessions according to your own personal goals

column2:
>

column3:
>

 

Finally an armband that makes your smartphone fully usable while running. Finally an armband made for smartphones!
column7: >Over the past year, Shapeheart has been tested by dozens of members of our community on their workouts. Our armband is
column9: >now ready to be manufactured
column11: > and you will be funding the first batch of production.
column13:
>

Shapeheart is giving back all its power to your phone. No need to wring your neck over your arm, it's now easy to text, use your GPS, switch between songs, take pictures or check your pace. 

No risk of your phone falling while you work out! Check out this video:
column15:
showinfo=0"">
If you need any information, send us an email at runner@shapeheart.com
column17:
/>

No need to weigh yourself down with additional devices on your run. We've added what your phone was missing: a sensor for accurate heart rate measurement.

With our magnetic phone case your heart rate becomes easier than ever to access, making your phone a real running device:
column18:
>

Heart rate is the only data that indicates the real intensity of your effort. It helps find the right pace to keep you away from burnouts or injuries, and make faster progress towards your personal goals: weight loss, race preparation, or reaching your personal best finish time...
column19: >
column20:
>

Positioned inside the black or red silicon part of the armband, it pairs with your phone via Bluetooth (LBE). Our sensor has been studied to accurately measure your pulse on this upper part of your arm.
column23:
>

Once paired via bluetooth, your heart rate is directly displayed into your favorite running app, so you can easily check your pace, distance, and heart rate at a glance from the same interface.
column24:
>

Check our video for a set up demo video:

column1: <div><div class=""campaignStoryVideoWrapper""><iframe src=""https://www.youtube.com/embed/aUUCkDs4vs0?autohide=1&amp
The armband is positioned in the ideal spot for our sensor, making its readings more trustworthy than fitness devices worn on the wrist. Here is why the upper arm is more accurate:
<li>
no light interference for optimum sensing
<li>
more stability, as the top of your arm swings less than your wrist
<li>
no hair interference, which can impede sensors on the forearm

column2:
>

Position our Winter Kit under your clothes to keep the sensor in contact with your skin. Once dressed, put the armband on with your phone. You're ready to go.
column7:
>

Once you have chosen the size that's right for your arm, the band stays secured -- so putting Shapeheart on will always be a cinch. Smart, isn’t it?

column1: <li>
quickly unlock your phone with Shapeheart's fingerprint hole
<li>
touch-screen windowed compartment approved by our community to easily control your phone's features.

column4:
>

Five runners in our community tested Shapeheart under intense rain during the Paris Half Marathon in March 2017. Their phones were unscathed, thanks to the protective sleeve on the top of the case! Nevertheless, we do not recommend exposing your phone to water.
column6:
>

Why should you put up with an expensive, cumbersome second device, when your smartphone already integrates all the other features that make your run enjoyable (running apps, music, GPS…)? With ShapeHeart, you access the huge value of heart rate monitoring with a smart budget.
column8:
>

 Shapeheart is Runner's World Award at CES 2017.
column9:
>

Over the past year we tested Shapeheart over 300 times with avid runners. Their feedback has been crucial in optimizing Shapeheart.
column12:
>

Except for the 39€ reward, all the rewards are including the connected version of Shapeheart with its HR sensor.
column15:
>

Our team is specialized in hardware product development and distribution. Our product is developed with the support of technical partners in charge of the product industrialization.
column16:
>

 

Product FAQ: 

If you need any information, send us an email at runner@shapeheart.com

Which running apps are compatible with Shapeheart?

Every app that provides a heart rate monitoring feature: Runtastic // Endomondo // Nike Run Club // Strava // Runkeeper // MapMyRun // MapMyFitness // Digifit // Virtual Training // 3,2,1 Run // Irunner // Virtual Runner // Polar Beat... and much more.

Is my smartphone size compatible with Shapeheart?

Our 3 case sizes cover smartphone with a screen size going from 4"" to 6,2"". For iPhones it goes from iPhone 4 to iPhone 7 Plus. For Samsung it goes from Samsung A3 to Samsung S8. A survey will be sent at the end of the campaign in order for you to choose your smartphone case size.

Is there any risk that my phone fall while I’m running?

Our magnetic system has been studied to withstand 30 times the weight of your smartphone. After 300 tests with our community, we have never broken a phone screen.

Is the armband weather proof?

Yes. Our armband will obviously add a protection to your smartphone. As a proof, Shapeheart has been tested under intense rain during the Paris Half Marathon in March 2017. The 5 phones were unscathed at the end of the race.

Are magnets dangerous for my phone?

Absolutely not. Our patented system was designed so that magnets are trapped between two metal plates. This ensures to minimize the magnetic field and protect your phone's components.

I already have a running watch, how can I take the most of Shapeheart?

If you have a bluetooth smartwatch you can pair it with your phone to access the high accuracy of our sensor directly on your watch interface. If sometimes you have to choose between heart rate on your smartwatch and your music on your smartphone, just leave the smartwatch at home and go running with our armband.

Do you offer your own running application?

No. We want you to keep your running habits. But we may propose something nice if we reach a significant amount of funding :)

Have you tried everything to get rid of cellulite? We have!  

Although we all wish it was possible, we know that no cosmetic gel or cream alone can penetrate the skin to target the fat underneath. Like water, it simply can't get through. That’s why professional treatments used by many celebrities  use advanced technologies to penetrate the skin. We all know those treatments are effective, yet expensive.

Assome! is different!

Assome! Ultrasonic Massager combines advanced technologies of deep skin penetration used by professionals with  100% concentrated serums. Assome! delivers Salon results for the fraction of salon price.

 

 

Assome! Ultrasonic Massager penetrates deep under your skin to:

1. Firm

2. Lift

3. Reduce Cellulite

 

ASSOME! IS A PROFESSIONAL TECHNOLOGY TO USE AT HOME

 

ASSOME! WILL COST YOU A FRACTION OF WHAT YOU WOULD PAY AT A BEAUTY SALON

 

ASSOME! DELIVERS PROFESSIONAL RESULTS IN 90 DAYS

WOMEN WHO TRIED ASSOME! ARE AMAZED!

column2: >
column3:
>

 

We engineered freedom so you can enjoy it!

The Functional Footwear design concept is based on the principle of toefreedom®, which provides the runner with an increase in stability due to extra room for the big toe to anchor, stabilize and control the foot. The rest of the body can relax, move efficiently and avoid overuse and unnatural stresses on joints and muscles.

In conventional footwear, the toes (especially the big toe) are squished and cannot perform their natural function to anchor and stabilize the foot. As a result you stand, walk and run on an unstable base which leads not only to discomfort but is also the most common denominator for pain and injury.
column6:
>The nimbleToes Trail Addict

 

__________________________________________________________________________________________

Why toefreedom®?

We at Joe Nimble believe, that a tree is only as strong as its roots
column7: just as the roots of a tree adapt to the shape of a container, the shape of the foot adapts to the shoes you are wearing.  Conventional shoes with a shoe-shaped toebox create unnatural, shoe-shaped feet. From the assessment of thousands of feet worldwide, we have learned that just as weak and twisted tree roots affect the stability of the trunk and branches above, so do weak and twisted toes affect the stability of the runner above.
column8:
>*References below

__________________________________________________________________________________________

__________________________________________________________________________________________

We made sure you will love this shoe!

 

__________________________________________________________________________________________

The skill of trailrunning

Common injuries in trail running like  knee-, metatarsal- and lower back-pain are due to a lack of skill in switching between gears. The combined benefits of the toefreedom® concept and the flexitec insole have never been offered before in a trail running shoe and we believe this unique combination can be an essential part of the solution to pain-free trail running.
column15:
>BIOMECHANIST, RUNNING COACH AND CREATOR​ OF THE FUNCTIONAL FOOTMAP.

Lee is one of the most recognised coaches for running technique on an international level.  
His knowledge and experience in running biomechanics and foot function has benefited injured runners, both recreational and elite around the globe and led him to develop the Functional FootMap assessment system.
column17:
> 

 

__________________________________________________________________________________________

Protection

Protective FLEXITEC® insole

The 4mm thin spring-steel insole is modelled on the anatomy of the foot. Its unique construction promotes an even weight and pressure distribution throughout the foot and ads an extra layer of protection from sharp, irregular objects on the trail.  Experience a new level of confidence and performance during your run, after inserting this simple but brilliant piece of innovation.

column1: <div><div class=""campaignStoryVideoWrapper""><iframe src=""https://www.youtube.com/embed/iubxMlxQkyA?autohide=1&amp
SHOE PIONEER AND INVENTOR OF THE FUNCTIONAL FOOTWEAR DESIGN CONCEPT

Sebastian´s family has been making shoes with toefreedom® for over three decades.  His experience of helping people all around the world to improve their foot function through the benefits of toefreedom® and his passion for running has led him to create the Functional Footwear Design Concept.

__________________________________________________________________________________________

Stability

__________________________________________________________________________________________

Traction

Soles by Michelin Technology

Michelin has been forging a better way forward for over 100 years. They have spanned millions of miles on the mission to develop groundbreaking multi-surface contact for vehicles operating in the most challenging environments all over the world. We decided to partner with Soles by Michelin because of their unrivalled expertise in rubber and tread design to equip our nimbleToes Trail Addict with the perfect outsole for Functional Footwear to meet the unique demands of trailrunning.
column6:
showinfo=0"">

__________________________________________________________________________________________

Inspiration

Badwater Ultra - the world´s toughest footrace

When crewing at the worlds toughest footrace, the Badwater Ultramarathon, a few years ago, Sebastian observed that a lot of the elite athletes cut open the front of their running shoe to have more freedom for their toes and reduce the risk of injury.  His unique know-how in making casual shoes with toefreedom® inspired him to introduce this design philosophy to the running shoe industry.

__________________________________________________________________________________________

""Function""

noun

an activity that is natural to or the purpose of a person or thing. (Oxford English Dictionary)

The purpose of the foot is to provide a stable base of support to control the direction of the body weight during the stance phase of locomotion [1-3]. Newtonian physics dictates that a wider base of support is more stable than a narrow base. Width and stability of the forefoot is crucial in this regard as the highest forces during mid stance occur at the forefoot [4, 5]. A greater spread of the toes, the great toe in particular, reduces forefoot peak pressures, distributes force more evenly, and stabilises the foot and ankle [6-8]. Toes squashed together by years of wearing narrow shoes that do not respect the natural fan shape of the human foot [9] are common [10] and are linked to instability and movement-related pain [11, 12]. Natural function can be restored by regular loading of the feet in footwear that respect natural design of the foot [13] and permit freedom for the toes to spread and stabilise the foot.

Pain-free movement begins with a stable base of support. A stable foot requires Toe freedom, only functional footwear provides toe freedom. Joe Nimble ‘functional footwear’ is based on this science.

column3:
>

DR WILKINSON
Dr Wilkinson´s research area is the biology of human health and performance. His work has included the biomechanics and performance determinants of distance running and the link between plantar sensation and regulation of bipedal gait.  He has a particular interest in the influence of footwear on foot structure, function and joint loading during running.

__________________________________________________________________________________________

Ambassadors
column7:
showinfo=0"">

__________________________________________________________________________________________

Testimonials

__________________________________________________________________________________________

If you’re new to Joe Nimble Functional Footwear you might be wondering what the right shoe size is you should buy. Well, the good news is: You just need to order your regular shoe size.

MEASURE YOUR FEET
If you are not sure about your right shoe size, here are some simple instructions for measuring your feet. You only need:

column1: • a sheet of paper
• a pencil
• a ruler or measuring tape

This is how it works: Stand on the paper with both feet while you are wearing socks. Simply trace around the outline of your feet with a pencil one after the other.

Important: Always hold the pencil upright on the paper, not leaning tot he inside or outside in order to get an accurate result.

Now simply measure the length of your drawing. Measure from the tip oft he longest toe tot he bottom (at the center) of your heel. If your feet are different sizes, then the bigger foot determines the correct shoe size.

References 1: Running related pain and injury

* Most running related injuries (RRIs) can be classified as ‘overuse’ injuries which occur from the accumulative loading of the musculoskeletal system beyond it’s capacity to recover and adapt (1). Approximately 60% of RRIs are caused by training errors which result from doing TOO much, TOO soon with TOO little rest in between training sessions (2,3). The remaining 40% of RRIs are caused by anatomical factors, running shoes and training surfaces which independentlyand in combination affect the biomechanical behavior of the foot and the loading of the ankle, knee, hip and lumbopelvis (2,3,4). The interaction of the foot-shoe-surface and it’s effect on running biomechanics can therefore be considered to bethe most important influence on RRIs after ‘training errors’ and the selection of the most appropriate shoe based on the runner’s level of foot function, age, weight and chosen running surface should be considered fundamental to the prevention of injury and pain-free running (2,3,5,6).

For more information and to see a full list of common running related pain and injuries please see the sources attached:

1. Hreljac A. (2005) Etiology,Prevention and Early Intervention of Overuse Injuries in Runners: A Biomechanical Perspective. Phys Med Rehabil Clin N Am (https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/16005398/).

2. James, S. L., Bates, B. T., &
column5:

","We engineered freedom so you can enjoy it!The Functional Footwear design concept is based on the principle of toefreedom®, which provides the runner with an increase in stability due to extra room for the big toe to anchor, stabilize and control the foot. The rest of the body can relax, move efficiently and avoid overuse and unnatural stresses on joints and muscles.In conventional footwear, the toes (especially the big toe) are squished and cannot perform their natural function to anchor and stabilize the foot. As a result you stand, walk and run on an unstable base which leads not only to discomfort but is also the most common denominator for pain and injury.*References below__________________________________________________________________________________________The nimbleToes Trail Addict __________________________________________________________________________________________Why toefreedom®?We at Joe Nimble believe, that a tree is only as strong as its roots
column9: just as the roots of a tree adapt to the shape of a container, the shape of the foot adapts to the shoes you are wearing.  Conventional shoes with a shoe-shaped toebox create unnatural, shoe-shaped feet. From the assessment of thousands of feet worldwide, we have learned that just as weak and twisted tree roots affect the stability of the trunk and branches above, so do weak and twisted toes affect the stability of the runner above.*References below____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________We made sure you will love this shoe! __________________________________________________________________________________________The skill of trailrunningCommon injuries in trail running like  knee-, metatarsal- and lower back-pain are due to a lack of skill in switching between gears. The combined benefits of the toefreedom® concept and the flexitec insole have never been offered before in a trail running shoe and we believe this unique combination can be an essential part of the solution to pain-free trail running.*References below BIOMECHANIST, RUNNING COACH AND CREATOR​ OF THE FUNCTIONAL FOOTMAP.Lee is one of the most recognised coaches for running technique on an international level.  His knowledge and experience in running biomechanics and foot function has benefited injured runners, both recreational and elite around the globe and led him to develop the Functional FootMap assessment system.  __________________________________________________________________________________________ProtectionProtective FLEXITEC® insoleThe 4mm thin spring-steel insole is modelled on the anatomy of the foot. Its unique construction promotes an even weight and pressure distribution throughout the foot and ads an extra layer of protection from sharp, irregular objects on the trail.  Experience a new level of confidence and performance during your run, after inserting this simple but brilliant piece of innovation.

column1: SHOE PIONEER AND INVENTOR OF THE FUNCTIONAL FOOTWEAR DESIGN CONCEPT

Sebastian´s family has been making shoes with toefreedom® for over three decades.  His experience of helping people all around the world to improve their foot function through the benefits of toefreedom® and his passion for running has led him to create the Functional Footwear Design Concept.

__________________________________________________________________________________________Stability__________________________________________________________________________________________TractionSoles by Michelin TechnologyMichelin has been forging a better way forward for over 100 years. They have spanned millions of miles on the mission to develop groundbreaking multi-surface contact for vehicles operating in the most challenging environments all over the world. We decided to partner with Soles by Michelin because of their unrivalled expertise in rubber and tread design to equip our nimbleToes Trail Addict with the perfect outsole for Functional Footwear to meet the unique demands of trailrunning. __________________________________________________________________________________________InspirationBadwater Ultra - the world´s toughest footraceWhen crewing at the worlds toughest footrace, the Badwater Ultramarathon, a few years ago, Sebastian observed that a lot of the elite athletes cut open the front of their running shoe to have more freedom for their toes and reduce the risk of injury.  His unique know-how in making casual shoes with toefreedom® inspired him to introduce this design philosophy to the running shoe industry.__________________________________________________________________________________________""Function""nounan activity that is natural to or the purpose of a person or thing. (Oxford English Dictionary)The purpose of the foot is to provide a stable base of support to control the direction of the body weight during the stance phase of locomotion [1-3]. Newtonian physics dictates that a wider base of support is more stable than a narrow base. Width and stability of the forefoot is crucial in this regard as the highest forces during mid stance occur at the forefoot [4, 5]. A greater spread of the toes, the great toe in particular, reduces forefoot peak pressures, distributes force more evenly, and stabilises the foot and ankle [6-8]. Toes squashed together by years of wearing narrow shoes that do not respect the natural fan shape of the human foot [9] are common [10] and are linked to instability and movement-related pain [11, 12]. Natural function can be restored by regular loading of the feet in footwear that respect natural design of the foot [13] and permit freedom for the toes to spread and stabilise the foot.Pain-free movement begins with a stable base of support. A stable foot requires Toe freedom, only functional footwear provides toe freedom. Joe Nimble ‘functional footwear’ is based on this science. *References below

DR WILKINSONDr Wilkinson´s research area is the biology of human health and performance. His work has included the biomechanics and performance determinants of distance running and the link between plantar sensation and regulation of bipedal gait.  He has a particular interest in the influence of footwear on foot structure, function and joint loading during running.__________________________________________________________________________________________Ambassadors__________________________________________________________________________________________The History of toefreedom®__________________________________________________________________________________________Testimonials__________________________________________________________________________________________If you’re new to Joe Nimble Functional Footwear you might be wondering what the right shoe size is you should buy. Well, the good news is: You just need to order your regular shoe size.MEASURE YOUR FEETIf you are not sure about your right shoe size, here are some simple instructions for measuring your feet. You only need:
a sheet of paper
a pencil
a ruler or measuring tape

This is how it works: Stand on the paper with both feet while you are wearing socks. Simply trace around the outline of your feet with a pencil one after the other.Important: Always hold the pencil upright on the paper, not leaning tot he inside or outside in order to get an accurate result.Now simply measure the length of your drawing. Measure from the tip oft he longest toe tot he bottom (at the center) of your heel. If your feet are different sizes, then the bigger foot determines the correct shoe size. ____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________Perks __________________________________________________________________________________________Social MediaYou can find more information about Joe Nimble here:Joe Nimble on the web: https://joe-nimble.com/intJoe Nimble on Facebook: www.facebook.com/joenimbleDEJoe Nimble on Instagram: www.instagram.com/joenimbleJoe Nimble on YouTube: https://bit.ly/2Q1EJVVJoe Nimble Blog: https://www.joe-nimble.com/int/explore/the-scie...myFoot education: http://myFoot.com____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________*** Free shipping wordwide (except Russian Federation)***** Campaign ends 09. Introducing Pelotan: high-performance sun protection designed for cyclists

We created Pelotan as a sun protection brand that recognised the needs of cyclists from professional athletes to weekend club riders. The product has been designed from the ground up specifically for cyclists as ‘once a day’, water and sweat resistant sun protection, allowing you to stay in the saddle longer, perfecting those ultra-sharp tan lines from sunrise to sunset.

Razor sharp tan lines across one’s thighs and biceps can elicit a simple nod of mutual respect from fellow riders (Velominati rule #7…) but can quickly lead to a hunt for a bottle of aloe vera to soothe dangerous and painful sunburn which, aside from affecting short term performance in the saddle, can have very negative long term consequences.
<div>

High profile cases of professional riders being seriously burnt after stage events (everyone from Chris Froome to Louis Meintjes and Rudi Selig) and countless examples of riders burning from even shorter training or social rides highlighted the necessity for a specialist product.

Working alongside professional teams and cosmetic experts our formula has been subject to a testing and refinement process, culminating in Pelotan -  the world's first sun protection designed specifically to improve performance, maximise comfort and allow cyclists to ride longer, tan sharper.
Manufactured in the UK, the finished product conforms to EU regulations on UVA and UVB  protection, is photostable, dermatologically tested, contains no preservatives and isn’t tested on animals.

Pelotan SPF30 protects your skin from harmful sun radiation 30 times longer than natural protection and a single application, if done correctly, will last up to 8 hours – meaning you can ride from sunrise to sunset.
Our Campaign

We have already invested significant time and resource developing Pelotan, working closely with professional teams and cosmetic experts to produce a sun protection product that performs at the highest level. We are launching the brand across Europe in Summer 2018 and have plans to enter the Australian, Asian and Middle Eastern markets later this year - before arriving in the USA in 2019.
Your support will help us:
<ul>
• Expand into international markets, creating a global sun protection brand made by cyclists, for cyclists

• Work with more professional teams and sponsored athletes to improve comfort and performance in races from UCI Level down to regional comps - giving marginal gains that could make the difference between a place on the podium and the Yellow Jersey
• Continue our product development as we push the boundaries of performance
• Introduce new sizes and specifications into our product range
• Continue to support grass-roots cycling events, sportives and charity rides - ensuring rider safety and comfort
All campaign backers will receive exclusive early bird offers and discounts on future products.
Order now and Pelotan will be delivered in June (EU)
Our flagship product - Pelotan SPF 30 (200ml) is available for immediate dispatch to EU countries.

Our range of exclusive Pelotan accessories including Pelotan x Isadore Jersey and Bidons are available for dispatch worldwide throughout June. Our professional training plans are available for delivery via email and our incredible experiential 'Yellow Jersey Bundle' including a ride in a team car in a professional race will be arranged with supporters privately.
Pro Team Support
As part of a commitment to high performance, Pelotan are working with the UK’s #1 domestic team Ribble Pro Cycling for the 2018 season.

We are proud to support incredible cycling teams throughout their seasons, from training camps to races. We have developed premium sun protection products with the performance cyclist in mind as we firmly believe that in a world of marginal gains, comfortable riders race harder. Our long-lasting formula enables our riders and teams to train, race and recover in the sunshine for longer - from sunrise to sunset.
Some recent Ribble Pro Cycling successes:
<ul>
• British Team Pursuit Champions
• British Individual Pursuit Champion
• British Individual Pursuit Silver Medallist
• British Kilo Time Trial Champion
• Gp Oued Eddahab Uci 1.2  -2nd
<li>Tour Of Malta Gc &amp
• British 10mile TT All Time Team Record Holders
• British Circuit Time Trial Champion
• British National Team Time Trial Champions
• British Cycling U23 Time Trial Bronze Medallist
• British National 50mile TT Champion
• British Masters Track Scratch Race Champion
• British Masters Track Individual Pursuit Champion
We have also agreed to support a UCI Women's WorldTour Team for the 2019 season, starting in January at the Santos Women’s Tour Down Under in Australia.
<div>
Pelotan x Isadore
<div>
We are delighted to be working with one of the world's leading manufacturers of high-performance cycling clothing, Isadore, to create a unique Pelotan x Isadore jersey.

Isadore is the vision of Martin Velits (former professional cyclist for Etixx-Quickstep) and his twin brother Peter (who rode for BMC). Racking up tens of thousands of kilometres per year training and racing across the globe lends a pretty unbeatable sense of what works well in cycling clothing and what doesn’t - Isadore is a culmination of a lifetime dedicated to the road.

We have teamed up to create a limited edition Climber's Jersey specifically made for intensive workouts and riding uphill - the Climber's Jersey will keep the body temperature balanced when it’s hot outside. Merino fibres naturally absorb UV radiation, protecting the skin from the damage caused by direct sunlight. See lots more of Isadore's kit in action in our launch video!
<div>
Pelotan x Rouleur
<div>
Rouleur magazine is the world’s finest road cycling journal, read by a global group of dedicated road cycling fans, pro riders and the most influential bike riders in the world.

The Rouleur Emporium offers the very best cycling products, exclusively curated for on the bike, off the bike and for your home. Rouleur have notoriously high standards and work hard to create the finest range of exclusive items - including Pelotan.
For the Summer 2018 Season, Rouleur Emporium will be the exclusive online retailer of Pelotan products, sitting alongside many of the most well-respected brands in the market.
<div>
FAQ
<div>
Q: Which markets can Pelotan be shipped to?
A: Currently Pelotan is shipping to any country within the EU. Our plan is to launch in Australia, Asia and the Middle East later in 2018, before arriving in the USA in 2019.
Q: Which markets can accessories be shipped to?
A: We can ship our accessories (Pelotan x Isadore Jersey, Bidons and Training Plans) to any country in the world.
Q: How quickly can I get my hands on Pelotan?

A: We are in production at the moment and have 2000+ units of our flagship product ready to ship immediately. Our production is scaling up and huge demand may lead to minor delays, so get your order in early!
Q: Does Pelotan conform to EU Regulations on UVA and UVB protection?
A: Yes - it does (shown by UVA and UVB logos circled on packaging). Pelotan has been shown to last up to 8 hours from a single application, if applied correctly.
Q: What SPF is Pelotan?
A: Our flagship line is SPF 30, which is recommended for exposure to the sun in the EU. Every skin is different, but we find that SPF 30 offers adequate protection to even those with sensitive skin.
Q: Does Pelotan work for non-cyclists?

A: Absolutely, yes. Pelotan works in any environment but is designed with characteristics that make it especially effective for cycling - namely it is lightweight, non-greasy, quickly absorbed, ‘once a day’, water and sweat resistant sun protection - making it perfect for a day in the saddle.
Q: Does Pelotan stain clothing?
A: We designed Pelotan specifically not to mark clothing - but recommend allowing it to fully dry before putting on your favourite kit. Marginal gains, not terminal stains.

We are delighted to be working with one of the world's leading manufacturers of high-performance cycling clothing, Isadore, to create a unique Pelotan x Isadore jersey.

Isadore is the vision of Martin Velits (former professional cyclist for Etixx-Quickstep) and his twin brother Peter (who rode for BMC). Racking up tens of thousands of kilometres per year training and racing across the globe lends a pretty unbeatable sense of what works well in cycling clothing and what doesn’t - Isadore is a culmination of a lifetime dedicated to the road.

We have teamed up to create a limited edition Climber's Jersey specifically made for intensive workouts and riding uphill - the Climber's Jersey will keep the body temperature balanced when it’s hot outside. Merino fibres naturally absorb UV radiation, protecting the skin from the damage caused by direct sunlight. See lots more of Isadore's kit in action in our launch video!
Pelotan x Rouleur
Rouleur magazine is the world’s finest road cycling journal, read by a global group of dedicated road cycling fans, pro riders and the most influential bike riders in the world.

The Rouleur Emporium offers the very best cycling products, exclusively curated for on the bike, off the bike and for your home. Rouleur have notoriously high standards and work hard to create the finest range of exclusive items - including Pelotan.
For the Summer 2018 Season, Rouleur Emporium will be the exclusive online retailer of Pelotan products, sitting alongside many of the most well-respected brands in the market.
FAQ
Q: Which markets can Pelotan be shipped to?
A: Currently Pelotan is shipping to any country within the EU. Our plan is to launch in Australia, Asia and the Middle East later in 2018, before arriving in the USA in 2019.
Q: Which markets can accessories be shipped to?
A: We can ship our accessories (Pelotan x Isadore Jersey, Bidons and Training Plans) to any country in the world.
Q: How quickly can I get my hands on Pelotan?

A: We are in production at the moment and have 2000+ units of our flagship product ready to ship immediately. Our production is scaling up and huge demand may lead to minor delays, so get your order in early!
Q: Does Pelotan conform to EU Regulations on UVA and UVB protection?
A: Yes - it does (shown by UVA and UVB logos circled on packaging). Pelotan has been shown to last up to 8 hours from a single application, if applied correctly.
Q: What SPF is Pelotan?
A: Our flagship line is SPF 30, which is recommended for exposure to the sun in the EU. Every skin is different, but we find that SPF 30 offers adequate protection to even those with sensitive skin.
Q: Does Pelotan work for non-cyclists?

A: Absolutely, yes. Pelotan works in any environment but is designed with characteristics that make it especially effective for cycling - namely it is lightweight, non-greasy, quickly absorbed, ‘once a day’, water and sweat resistant sun protection - making it perfect for a day in the saddle.
Q: Does Pelotan stain clothing?
A: We designed Pelotan specifically not to mark clothing - but recommend allowing it to fully dry before putting on your favourite kit. Marginal gains, not terminal stains.",14.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Lincoln, United Kingdom",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/pelotan-sun-protection-for-cyclists/pica

Enerpad Massager is an extra-powerful percussion massager that is completely cordless for easy maneuvering with 5 different massage programs to suit all your needs. Powered by premium Japan lithium-ion high efficiency rechargeable battery with high torsion DC electric motor, Enerpad Massager is unlike any other massagers out there.  Relax your muscles and relieve your body stress with a simple to use, affordable, and powerful smart cordless massager.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Input voltage: 5V/1A
Charging time: 4-5 hours
Operation time: Up to 180 minutes of continuous use
Battery type: Panasonic Cell Lithium-ion 3.6V 
Battery capacity: 2600 mAh x 2
Program modes: 5
Weight: 750g/1.65lbs
Size: 40cm x 6.5cm x 12cm
column2: >Help us unlock these colors!

column1:
Share on Facebook
Share on Twitter

What is Enerpad Massager?
Enerpad Massager is an extra-powerful percussion massager that is completely cordless with 5 different massage programs and 4 different tips to suit all your needs. Powered by high efficiency lithium-ion rechargeable battery. 

How does Enerpad Massager work?
Enerpad Massager's powerful percussion head penetrates deep into muscle tissue to relieve muscle soreness and fatigue. With 5 different massage programs and 4 different tips to relieve the muscle tensions affecting different muscle groups on your foot, legs, neck, back, and shoulders. 

How do you use the Enerpad Massager?
To start the massage, all you need to do is first, make sure the battery is charged, place the tip of your choice, select your desired massage program with just a push of a button, and point the tip to where the muscle tension is. 

How long does the battery last for?
A fully charged battery can last up to 180 minutes of continuous use.

How do I charge the Enerpad Massager, and how long do I charge it?
The Enerpad Massager uses micro USB for charging. It only takes 4-5 hours for a full charge.

What is the warranty on Enerpad Massager?
We provide a one (1) year limited warranty. We guarantee that you will receive your Enerpad Massager free of manufacturing defects.

column2:
>We have designed a reusable therapeutic gel wrap that allows for hot or cold and true compression!

 

Opus gel™ is a visco-elastic polymer that:

column1: • Can be heated or cooled to desired temperature
• Is pliable at all temperatures…even when very cold
• Can wrap any body part (large or small)
• Is always in direct contact with large skin area
• Retains its’ shape when stretched
• Is durable and re-usable
• Can be easily cleaned, even disinfected

column4:
>So now you can customize your treatment to the most effective temperature and compression...and our wrap even works at room temperature.

 

 

Our initial feedback from health professionals and therapists confirms our Opus gel™ wrap will dramatically improve the treatment and prevention of muscle and joint injuries.

Opus gel™ is made in Canada and is approved by Health Canada. We are currently awaiting FDA approval, but this won't delay shipping after the campaign!

Your very own Opus gel™ wrap will arrive in a resealable bag for easy freezer storage! Check out our packaging below!
column5:
>Stop wasting time with methods that don't work...

 

Start using Opus gel™!

column1:
Why the name Opus gel™?

The word opus is often used to describe a creative work of art. A masterpiece. Our Opus gel™ is unique and was produced after considerable research and development. We believe the name Opus gel™ is a ‘fitting’ choice.

Why does gel usually feel ‘cool’?

Technically speaking, our Opus gel™ has a relatively high coefficient of thermal conductivity. This means that when your hand (or any part of your body) comes into contact with our gel, heat moves from the warmer body part to the cooler gel, thus your hand feels cool.

Why hot or cold?

The debate between hot and cold therapy for the treatment of injuries will likely continue among health professionals for years to come. Regardless, we prefer cold therapy (but don’t worry, your Opus gel™ wrap can also be used hot as well). Heat therapy is often recommended for more chronic types of injuries, whereas cold often helps with pain relief and relaxation of muscle tissue.

Our gel works, we have the data to prove it!
• We placed skin temperature sensors on the forearm of participants
• We then wrapped the forearm with the Opus gel™ wrap
• After 10 minutes, the wrap reduced skin temperature by over 10°C!

What about compression?

Compression helps to reduce swelling. Plus, studies have shown that cold treatment is more effective in combination with compression!

How well can Opus gel™ compress?

You will be amazed to discover your Opus gel™ wrap will stretch up to 10 times its’ usual length and will always return to its’ original length. It is this pliable property that lets you vary the amount of compression that you desire, and it still works when the Opus gel™ is either hot or cold.

 

 

How long will the Opus gel™ wrap last?

A long time. Similar gels have withstood 20,000 deformations and have not been damaged. We have subjected our Opus gel™ to most cleaning products, including full strength bleach, with no adverse effects.

Can my Opus gel™ be cleaned?

It's simple - just use soap and water, or even a stronger disinfectant for a deep clean!

My Opus gel™ wrap is too long, what can I do?

Your Opus gel™ wrap will be a length that we believe will accommodate most people. However, it can be cut with scissors to a length or width that works better for you. In the future, we plan to produce more sizes and colours. What do you think?

Another 'cool'  feature: cut a small hole in one end of the wrap so it can be used as an 'anchor' for easy wrapping of certain body parts! Oh and Opus gel™ sticks to itself, so it's very easy to apply and stays snug in place. How 'cool'  is that?

 

How is the Opus gel™ wrap made?

It really is art meets science!

It starts with a mixture of ingredients (shhhhhh.....that's our secret), then heated to about 350 degrees. It is poured into a mold and once cooled Opus gel™ will always remain, or return to, its’ poured shape.

What does the gel feel like?

Opus gel™ is skin-like in texture and sticky by nature. Sticky is good for a wrap, and simply washing it in water will keep it this way. Rubbing Opus gel™ with talcum powder will eliminate the stickiness, if you prefer.

I love the product! How can I help the Opus gel™ campaign?

Thank you, we knew you would!

Please share and like our Facebook page, follow us on Twitter and  Instagram. This will help us tremendously! Plus, we will enter all our Facebook and Twitter followers into a draw each week for a FREE wrap!
column2: >Please help us spread the word about our awesome product and contact us at info@hexyoo.com if you would like to cover our story.
column3:
>Tell your friends, family, and use the Indiegogo share tools available for social media.

But wait, there's more!

Each package we ship during the campaign will contain some additional pieces of Opus gel™. We know you (and your entire family - even the cat, cats love playing with this stuff  :)  ) will be intrigued with the many uses our innovative gel will have, and we want you to let us know your thoughts and suggestions!

Each week during our campaign we will choose and feature (with your permission of course) the best testimonial or suggestion we receive. Your opinions are important to us, and we care about how you feel.

Why order now via the indiegogo campaign?

 

 

Five of the six members of our team have been the lead on individual successful start-ups across a variety of industries. This diversity of backgrounds allows us to draw from each others experience and grow as individual entrepreneurs, and as a company.

The only new business man on our team is Dr. Mike Holmes, a PhD in Biomechanics and Ergonomics. Dr. Mike founded and runs the Neuromechanics and Ergonomics LAB at our local university. The lab sounds fancy and it is...and because of it we have the scientific data to explain the unique performance of our compression wrap.

Enter the clinician...Dr. Kris Edwards. An entrepreneurial chiropractor and owner operator of a multidisciplinary health care clinic in Oshawa. He may not love research and crunching data points the way Dr. Mike does but he has a passion for helping his patients. The symbiotic relationship between the researcher and the clinician is strongly present and it has driven a lot of the research and development behind this new and innovative medical device. The Opus gel™  Compression Wrap has been field tested with rave reviews.

Our CEO Bob Macmillan is the youngest old person of the group. He really wants to be fishing, but his hands are full keeping the crew reigned in. Most recently, Bob was VP Admin of a national public affairs/public relations firm, prior to that he was assistant director of an adult training company. Realizing the Opus gel™  Wrap will have significant impact on the health and wellness segment. Bob has additional product launches on the drawing board...fishing is on hold for now!

Peter Davidson, our Chief Marketing Officer, is a seasoned strategic marketer that questions EVERYTHING! He even has an MBA that he earned before the guy who created the internet was even born. That's right...he had to wear pants while learning. Peter's diverse work background includes engineering, Group VP of Marketing and Sales, small business owner/operator, start-up consultant...and more recently he has been concerned with medical device innovation and development focusing on issues affecting a person’s wellness.

Our Chief Operations Officer, Jason Thomson, is also an entrepreneur who runs his own business. Jason's experience in manufacturing, production planning and logistics has made him the ""how to make it happen"" guy. As a sports enthusiast, he has already reaped the benefits of the Opus gel™ Wrap. The Wrap has soothed many minor injuries...now goalie Jason just needs something to help stop the pucks!

CFO Ross Libbey is a chartered accountant who brings to the team not only smart finance decisions but also years of experience in the business world. As the current president of an accounting firm, Ross is dedicated to making smart business decisions and obtaining successful results. Through his years of experience as a CPA, Ross is confident that the Opus gel™  Wrap is headed for success.
column4:
>Our team is passionate about health and wellness. The wrap is one of many ""gel inspired"" products that we have planned. Please help by supporting our first product, the Opus gel™  Wrap.

Short Summary
My name is Heather Skillern and I am a wife and mother of 2 that is ready to begin down the ""owning your own business path"". I am wanting to become a franchisee of a GREAT company called FIT4MOM!

I believe that FIT4MOM is a great concept. In this day and age I think everyone should be physical at least 30 minutes a day. I know firsthand how hard it is to get your ""pre""baby body back after you have children and then even harder trying to fit in working out between taking care of a newborn and keeping up with the housework. And if you get to workout while spending quality time with your little ones, there is nothing better!! I really love that the company is involved with charity organizations and committed to helping others. The different programs this company offers are: Stroller Strides, Fit4Baby, and Body Back. All-in-all I think FIT4MOM is a company that every mom should be into!

I am wanting to bring this awesome concept of working out while building lasting relationships with other moms to my area in Mount Juliet, TN because after doing countless research I could not find anything remotely close to what this company offers here. The amount I am asking to be funded is going to my franchise fee so I can purchase and start my home-based franchise.

I am all about being a ""local small business""! If you support all the local business's in your community, it only makes the community stronger!!

Any donation helps me get to my goal of becoming a independent business owner and making this country one step closer to be healthy and fit!

column2:
>

Where do you draw the line in protecting your child?  How much is too much to pay for their safety and your peace of mind?

column1: No parent wants to deal with the consequences of losing a child, yet undiagnosed heart conditions are estimated to claim the lives of 7,000 kids each year (under 18).  That’s over 135 deaths each week in the US.  The sad part is it can be prevented.

We have all heard stories about youth that are seemingly in excellent health, collapsing suddenly only to later learn it was caused by an unknown condition that predisposed them to sudden cardiac arrest (SCA).  And when SCA strikes, it must be responded to within minutes with CPR and an AED.  In most cases, there is only a 5% chance of survival and each minute that goes by without emergency responders taking action the chance of ever saving their life drops dramatically.

That is why Strive4Life Foundation strongly supports the ATS HeartCheck, a series of tests that help in determining who is at risk of SCA, and alerting parents and medical professionals so they can take action to prevent these untimely and senseless deaths.  Again, where do you draw the line in protecting your child….and what medical conditions are OK for them to have without you knowing?
column5:
>Early Detection is Crucial for Survival.

EVERY $100 RAISED PROVIDES CARDIAC SCREENING FOR 1 MORE CHILD!
column10:
>WE REACH OUR GOAL OR NOT, 100% OF THE MONEY RAISED GOES TOWARD CARDIAC SCREENING IN OUR YOUTH!

Learn more by visiting www.Strive4Life.org
column11: >To date, The Strive4Life Foundation has sponsored nearly 1,000 tests through schools and sports organizations.  Of those tested, 6% were identified by cardiologists as having heart related issues without presenting symptoms.  That's 60 youth who had no idea that they were at cardiac risk.  Today, because of this cardiac testing, these issues are being treated and watched by family physicians and specialists helping insure these young people lead long, productive lives.
column12: >YOU CAN HELP THE STRIVE4LIFE FOUNDATION KEEP OUR YOUTH HEALTHY AND SAFE, ALLOWING THEM TO GROW INTO STRONG AND CONTRIBUTING ADULTS.
column13:
>STRIVE4LIFE WANTS TO DO MORE, TEST MORE, EDUCATE MORE, AND WE NEED YOUR HELP!

**DONATE TODAY and support the health and wellness of our youth!
column14:
>BY REACHING OUR GOAL, STRIVE4LIFE WILL BE ABLE TO PROVIDE FUNDING FOR 500 MORE KIDS TO BE SCREENED! 

Strive4Life Foundation is a 501(c)(3)

Federal id 46-3549552

Overview

Hi, my name is Jeanne Hahne and I'm a registered nurse in San Francisco. I would like to introduce a new surgical face mask that can lift the barrier between patient and caregiver. That's really important for communication, seeing the entire facial expression, especially a reassuring smile. A clear mask means reading lips for the deaf and the elderly. For a scared child, a clear mask allows them to connect with their caregiver or family. The difference between an opaque and the FaceView Mask™ is CLEAR and can make a huge difference in patient care.

column2: />
column3:
/>The number one cause of medical errors is communication, and the FaceView Mask™ has the potential to reduce errors and promote better patient outcomes.

The benefits are clear, and we need your help to bring this next generation of face masks to the medical and hearing-impaired communities, as well as to the non-medical industries. Masks are also worn in dental offices, clean rooms in high tech, environmental services, disaster relief, nail salons, military uses and on the street!

We need help for production tooling, user and focus group studies, designing for mass production, medical design and testing. These are some of the areas involved to introduce a new medical device that is affordable.

column1:
Our goal is to produce three models of the FaceView Mask™. A non-medical model for personal use as a dust mask, a tested medical/surgical model, and a respirator model with N95 certification. Initial prototypes of the personal model are available now, but we still want to perfect this prototype.

This is so important! We need this mask because communication is enhanced by seeing an individual's entire face. As you check out the videos and visit the rest of the campaign page, let me say ""Thank you"" in advance for helping us make a difference!

What We Need and What You Get

The Indiegogo funds raised will enable us to complete the design, tooling, and testing that are needed to make an affordable mask for use in our hospitals and communities. We have to plan for its efficacy, durability and user-friendliness.
It is more complicated to manufacture a mask with a clear portion in terms of materials, labor, and processes. We also need to have FDA approval and go through regulatory processes.

Our initial mask is the personal dust mask version, not yet qualified for medical or occupational use.  If we exceed our goal, we can look forward to additional models, such as smaller sizes for children!

The Impact
column2:
/>The FaceView Mask™ will improve communication, connection and compassion. It can change the mask standard altogether. That is why I've been working on this project for a long time. You could be a part of bringing this change to the world and literally, CHANGE THE FACE OF PATIENT CARE!

The first nurse, Florence Nightingale, said, ""Were there none who were discontented with what they have, the world would never reach anything better."" She had a point. We need to be looking to make new things better, and the FaceView Mask™ has the potential to transform the medical/dental/occupational professions on a global scale. With your support, we can revolutionize the mask industry!

Other Ways You Can Help

The other way you can help us is to spread the word and let others know about our Indiegogo campaign. Talk about us on Facebook or tweet about it! 

Especially let others know who might benefit from FaceView masks. Friends or family members who are hearing-impaired or deaf would love to hear about the FaceView Mask™ and its ability to revolutionize interpersonal communication. We want to bring back the connection with people and improve communication, creating better outcomes and increased satisfaction!

Special thanks to:

Developing breakthrough products since 1964

MPR Associates, Inc.
Alexandria, VA 
www.breakthroughproducts.com

Little Rhory

Rhory was a happy little boy who will never get to blow out the candles on his second birthday. He was taken to the hospital with a fever and sent home with antibiotics...  the next day he was unable to eat or drink and couldn't stand. He was taken back to the hospital and then was flown to the closest large hospital. Rhory passed away the 48hrs later after being diagnosed with an enterovirus.

I am hoping to make this very hard time on my family easier. With minimum  health insurance there will be many medical bills that can not be covered by the family and other arrangements that need to be made so Rhory can be put to rest.
At least the last of Rhory's memories were of being in the arms of his mother and father who love him very much.

The proceeds of this charity will go to offset the medical costs for the family and towards the Enterovirus Foundation so that hopefully no other family has to lose a child to such a terrible illness.
The Enterovirus Foundation works toward
• Researching enteroviral infections and their role in disease.
• Finding antiviral medications that work.
• Improving diagnostic testing to detect enteroviruses more quickly, less invasively, and with methods that work in less advantaged areas of the world.
• Accelerating communication across the research and medical communities, including clinical education about the latest in diagnosis and treatment.

• Raising public awareness about enteroviruses and their role in disease
    •

How much longer would you like to live?

column1:
Tai Chi University offers a longevity program through the internal arts of Tai Chi, Meditation, and Acupressure Message Therapy.  

How often are we too busy to stop and consider our life path and how far it will go? Google defines longevity as “long life”, long existence or service”

The founder of Taiji, Zhang Sanfeng is reported to have lived 170 Years.
Li Ching Yuen is reported to have lived for 256 years.
For those of you who believe that this matters, let me ask:
<li>
<span style=""color: rgb(106, 106, 106)
column5: >What price would you put on being able to extend your lifespan?

column1: <li>
<span style=""color: rgb(106, 106, 106)
column5: >What price would you put on the life span of someone you know?

column1: <li>
<span style=""color: rgb(106, 106, 106)
column5: > how much would you give help

column1: Our programs are specifically designed to not only extend life but to also to do so in a very positive and meaningful way. For five years, we have shared the teachings in various venues. Now it is time to take the program to the next level by sharing them in a dedicated Tai Chi  and Meditation Studio.

We need another $2000 to reach our goal. Even a $1 will help us. 

For those of you who want to get one of these perks, time is running out. This perk package is available through the campaign.
<ul> <li>
When you donate $25 we will share a free digital book on how to find your true path (the path to longevity).
<li>
When you donate $50 we will share a guided meditation to help you start on your journey of longevity
<li>
And for those really generous people who give $100, we will give you both the book and the meditation.

Your contribution will help us take the ancient teachings of long fruitful living to even more people. Think of someone in your life who may benefit from this program. Your mother, aunt, sister, daughter or grandmother? Your son, brother, father or cousin. Someone just like them in our community will improve their chance of living longer when you donate because of class availability.

What is price for ignoring this opportunity? 

If you are NOT the kind of self-serving person who just doesn't care about the suffering of others, then I am talking to you. I am talking to you, the virtuous person who will take the time and send us what you can.
So just click that big red CONTRIBUTE NOW button and we move a step closer to goal.

“A journey of a thousand miles
Begins beneath the feet” Tao Te Ching: Chapter 64

Our programs specialize in peace of mind and longevity. Through classes, courses and workshops, we help people of all ages who suffer from all sorts of physical and emotional issues. With our new studio, we can offer classes and courses to a wider range of ages and fitness levels. These future students are just like people in your life wherever you are. It may be your Grandmother who has severe arthritis. It may be one of your children who has too much energy. It may be you, suffering from stress, anxiety, tension, worry, and simply wanting a way to find peace of mind. This could be your best friend who wants to lose weight and keep it off. You could help keep someone in the future from falling  because of strength and balance training (fall prevention). Below is a testimony by Bob and Lorraine Stuckey and how the practice of Tai Chi helped them improve their life.

Bob and Lorraine had to stop coming to class because of scheduling problems. With the new studio, multiple class times at the same location will enable them to return to class. 

The ancient arts have been proven over hundreds even thousands of years and they still serve us with great power for those who are ready to find it. This is why we are here. To share what we have learned so that others can feel better and live longer.

Please help us make the transition to our new space. The funding that we are asking for will keep our doors open and operating for the first year. In that year we will create the foundation for an organization that will serve those in need for many years to come.

As a small gift for helping us out, I am offering at no cost, one of the books that I wrote that explains how to find your true path. My story is one of a remarkable come back from rock bottom. In this book I tell how you too can find health and well-being. You will be able to download the e-book copy in pdf form. It is called “The Dixie Taoist – How To Find Your True Path, Volume One”.  



Here is a review of this book from Dr. Christopher Bell PhD (Neuro Psychologist with the VA)

     A follow-up in the spirit of his first book, 'Free Your Self: A Self-Awareness Handbook', The Dixie Taoist is a concise, accessible, and practical guide toward intentional living, increased mindfulness, and better stress management.
The evidence is in, and science is clear: Decreased stress and increased happiness are strongly correlated with the practice of mindfulness and living in the 'here-and-now'. Periods of increased and/or prolonged stress are linked to negative mental and physical health outcomes, such as: depression, anxiety, cardiovascular disease, immunosuppression, and decreased cognitive function… to name on the a few. And while the human brain is seemingly programmed toward distractibility and negative emotion, it is clear that intentional practice of meditation and mindfulness techniques can provide the individual with acute as well as sustained peace.
In the Dixie Taoist, the reader is exposed to the essence of the ancient teachings undergirding meditation and mindfulness, but in a manner that speaks more easily to the modern, Western mind.
Each lesson builds on the previous, but the chapters are written in a manner so that they are self-contained - thus affording the more 'distracted' of us the opportunity to explore the ideas contained herein in the order we find most appealing.
This is a great handbook and resource for those who are wanting to become increasingly committed to manifesting the happiness, peacefulness, and liberation of a still and centered mind.
Christopher Bell, Ph.D.
Licensed Psychologist


Testimony from a Tai Chi Student and member.
Many think that tai chi is a practice only for older adults because of its positive effect on folks who suffer from arthritis, stroke, and other age related conditions.  I have experienced a significant improvement in my balance and leg strength as a result of my daily practice. Both were poor due to nerve damage caused by an disorder called transverse myelitis.
But tai chi is a practice for the young as well.  Recent studies reveal that hypertension is present in 7% of US young adults and the rate is rising. Sleep problems can disturb up to 40% of young people. Heart disease rates are not declining in US residents under 18 as they are in the adult population.  Studies are showing that tai chi is beneficial for all of these conditions.
And it's ""meditation in motion"" aspect fits perfectly with all our attempts to bring moments of peace to our overstressed lifestyles.
I know a tai chi center in our community will allow us to share this tremendous practice with a much larger group of people. 
C.H.

One moment, one decision . . . a single act . . . can alter the course of a person’s life forever.

Intuitively we know this to be true. In reality we pay it very little heed in the course of the hundreds of decisions that comprise our daily existence.

On the evening of February 18, 2013, I learned this lesson with devastating finality.

The setting was at once serene, wonderful and innocent. My boyfriend and I were vacationing in Mexico and about to embark on a moonlit walk along the beach. Playfully, we raced each other . . . he, being faster, chose the stairs down to the sand. I, being more impulsive, chose a shortcut, over a retaining wall to the ground below. The distance was higher than I anticipated
column2:
the landing harder. One decision . . . one life-altering outcome.

I landed on my feet – the last time they would work for me – and quickly found myself on my back. I didn’t know what was wrong. There was no pain but I couldn’t feel my legs . . . I haven’t felt them since.

In the course of 24 hours I was operated on in Mexico, airlifted to Canada and operated on again in Toronto. That landing, that decision to jump, had burst my L1 vertebrae . . . leaving me paralyzed from the waist down . . . unable to walk, unable to exercise control over bodily functions that prior to this point I had taken for granted. I was 23 years old.

Now, almost a year has passed at the time of this writing. I am still in a chair . . . I may always be in a chair . . . but I am not about to accept that fact without fully exploring the boundaries of the human spirit and human will.

At the time of the accident, there was no health insurance to cover the cost of medical care in Mexico and the private airlift service back to Canada . . . the costs were enormous. Family and friends were – and continue to be – amazing in their support and generosity.

The costs associated with living an accommodated lifestyle continue to be significant – but the purpose of this indiegogo campaign is not to address the realities of today, but to seize the opportunities of tomorrow.

I have discovered a private and aggressive physiotherapy clinic that pushes those in situations like my own beyond the boundaries of what we think is possible, challenging limitations and creating new futures. It isn’t cheap. A single, three-hour session is $200. My target for this campaign is $10,400 – which would fund a single session per week for a year.

Asking for support isn’t easy. My family and friends have done so much just to ensure I have the same opportunities as anyone else . . . in terms of access, education and care. But dealing with today shouldn’t preclude us from dreaming about tomorrow.

I am 24 now . . . I want to walk, I want to dance . . . and, most of all, I want to know I tried.

*** Urgent Update.  This is a surprise for my mother.  Please don't tell her about it!***

 

In America today, there are millions of stories about cancer survivors.  Everyday our Facebook pages ask for “likes” to remember or congratulate cancer survivors.  I know how hard these people worked fighting their disease-- because my mother has fought cancer 3 times.  Not a single, recurrent cancer, but 3 separate diseases that each required unique treatments.

The terms “eradicated,” “remission,” and “cured,” all mean that cancer treatment is over, but they are not synonymous with healing. Mom (aka Ms. Diekman) is evidence of that.  Still tired, bald, and without appetite, she is starting to figure out what where life will lead her next. 

My mother has always been an adventurer.  She has stood on the Great Wall of China, snorkeled in Palou, jumped a ski jump on the continental divide, and driven coast to coast just to direct band in an inner-city school. 

Now, more than ever, she has the chance to rekindle her spirit of adventure.  With this fundraiser, we are hoping to giver her the gift of travel and rejuvenation for
her body and spirit.  Now that her students are graduated, children are raised, and cancer is gone (AGAIN), she can begin to live her dreams of seeing America one natural wonder at a time.  This travel will also give her the opportunity to reconnect with old friends, students, and family scattered about the country.  Visits long overdue from her dedication to teaching.

With your donation, you will be helping fund a guilt-free travel account for her to see America’s National Parks.  If you are lucky, she will also stop to visit you along the way.  Please consider a gift to Ms. Diekman and get her on the road! 

And keep watch for a minivan cranking up the Mozart.



 

","*** Urgent Update.  This is a surprise for my mother.  Please don't tell her about it!*** In America today, there are millions of stories about cancer survivors.  Everyday our Facebook pages ask for “likes” to remember or congratulate cancer survivors.  I know how hard these people worked fighting their disease-- because my mother has fought cancer 3 times.  Not a single, recurrent cancer, but 3 separate diseases that each required unique treatments.The terms “eradicated,” “remission,” and “cured,” all mean that cancer treatment is over, but they are not synonymous with healing. Mom (aka Ms. Diekman) is evidence of that.  Still tired, bald, and without appetite, she is starting to figure out what where life will lead her next.  My mother has always been an adventurer.  She has stood on the Great Wall of China, snorkeled in Palou, jumped a ski jump on the continental divide, and driven coast to coast just to direct band in an inner-city school.  Now, more than ever, she has the chance to rekindle her spirit of adventure.  With this fundraiser, we are hoping to giver her the gift of travel and rejuvenation forher body and spirit.  Now that her students are graduated, children are raised, and cancer is gone (AGAIN), she can begin to live her dreams of seeing America one natural wonder at a time.  This travel will also give her the opportunity to reconnect with old friends, students, and family scattered about the country.  Visits long overdue from her dedication to teaching. With your donation, you will be helping fund a guilt-free travel account for her to see America’s National Parks.  If you are lucky, she will also stop to visit you along the way.  Please consider a gift to Ms. Diekman and get her on the road! And keep watch for a minivan cranking up the Mozart.",0.0,0,"2 Campaigns

What’s this bitch tryin’ to do?

I want to bring my unique Dancer’s Body fitness technique to the world, online and for free. I’ve broken the workout into several ten minute videos that can be done one at a time or strung together for a complete, whole body workout sesh. It’s efficient, low impact, and a major ass kicker, requiring no props or weights, just an open space and at least ten minutes. Delivered productively, unpretentiously, and with a bit of humor.

A little bit about me... 

I live in the East Village of New York City working as a spin teacher, dancer, and fitness instructor. Next month you’ll find me in the Off Broadway musical version of “50 Shades of Grey” (kind of the Hamlet of musicals written after sex novels). I’ve spent the past three years on the road dancing across the country in Broadway National Tours, and, in my off time, perfecting my Dancer’s Body technique. My passion for fitness is deep and near fanatical, like a Twilight fan on a treadmill. It’s my favorite thing, rivaled only by Sriracha hot sauce and animals wearing human accessories like hats and sunglasses.

And the money?

This isn’t going to be some thrown together living room workout, oh no, this is going to be high quality, high production value, baby! All donations go towards a professional videographer/editor, space rentals, marketing, promotional photos, and background music rights.

Introduction

Friday Morning Run Club is now complete and the no-run fees are now due from our 19 participants.
Please fund your donations to this website.  As per the vote by FMRC members at the end of FMRC 2015, all money received will go to Project Fit America.

About Project Fit America

Project Fit America (""PFA"") is a national agency that works at the grassroots level with schools and front line educators to create new opportunities for kids to be active, fit and healthy. PFA believes in fit kids, one school at a time.  They work with communities to bring in funding, equipment, teacher training, curriculum and the resources schools need to actually get kids fit and foster a love of movement.  When PFA comes to a school, kids never want to miss PE and teachers report they see fantastic changes not just in their students' health, but in their attitude toward fitness and healthy life styles.

Other Ways You Can Help

Although you may have had an outstanding participation rate in FMRC 2015 (which means you owe $10), please feel free to dig deep in to your pockets to fund this great cause.
