We are ready to help you right now!

When was the last time you did something for yourself or someone you care about?  Get a hair mineral analysis test!  The hair test will provide information on ways to improve your vitality and energy levels.  The spin-off effects of your improved health will make you a more enjoyable person to be around, your increased energy will make you more productive, and simple health solutions and suggestions from our experienced practitioners will allow your body to begin to heal itself.

Let's say your test comes back showing high levels of mercury.  The practitioners will ask you if you consume large quantities of fish.  If you answer yes, a simple suggestion of eating less fish or smaller species that have had less time to accumulate mercury will be made.  If your test comes back high in aluminum, the practitioners will ask if you regularly consume tap water or use antiperspirants that may be contributing to your high aluminum levels.   If this is the case, alternative practical suggestions will be made.  If your test reveals low calcium then a tendency exists towards osteoporosis, bone fractures, dental cavities, muscle cramps, etc.  If your test reveals an elevated calcium level, a strong tendency exists for arteriosclerosis (hardening of the arteries due to calcium plaques).  Recommendations will be made for balancing calcium levels to normal based on the rest of the test results.

Individual mineral levels and heavy metal toxicities need to be viewed in the context of the entire hair test before specific recommendations will be made as the body works as a system rather than in individual parts.  The hair mineral analysis allows a qualified practitioner to see the entire picture of what is going on with your health.  The medical science behind the hair analysis test  enables practitioners to make life changing recommendations to balance your body.
Objectives of our campaign:
1. To promote awareness of hair mineral analysis, the sensible and scientific method of analyzing your health.
Our team has been using this evidence based method of health assessment for over thirty years.  It is time to bring this scientific process mainstream.
What if you spent the next twenty years trying to find out what is wrong with you only to discover that the well water you drank as a child contained lead?

Imagine the lead stored in your body causing you to have symptoms such as:  abnormal brain function, insomnia, depression, chronic constipation, diabetes, cancer, hypothyroidism.   Now imagine receiving all types of medication to combat your problems and not ever dealing with the root cause of the issue, which is the lead poisoning.
You want to be armed with all of the information you can possibly have to improve your health.  A simple hair test will provide you with very different information than a blood or urine test.

The first step to get out of the downward spiral is to see if there are any obvious imbalances in your body chemistry which will be shown on your hair analysis test results.  We will review your test results with you and make recommendations to bring your body back into balance so it can begin to heal itself.

Test Your Hair offers a healing protocol that will change your understanding regarding product and food choices, eating habits, drinking water, exercise, rest, weight balancing, and overall lifestyle.

2.  Never before have we been exposed to such high levels of stress and chemicals in our foods and environment.  We need to give Dr Lawrence Wilson the opportunity to update the out of print book Energy with current information so people are given the tools on how to increase energy and regain vitality.  (The book Energy is based on an interview with Dr Paul Eck, the pioneer of hair analysis.)

Many people today are burned out, stressed, more easily irritated, and fatigued, leading to deteriorating health.  Dr Lawrence Wilson has spent the last thirty years fine tuning the process of using hair analysis to pinpoint stress patterns and toxicities that cause fatigue and burnout.  We are working with Dr Wilson on Energy II, an easy-to-read guide that will help you increase your vitality and maintain your energy levels.  A must read for anyone struggling with low energy and looking for answers.
Help us help others.....

By telling your friends and family that Test Your Hair is an accurate and proven way of assessing stress patterns and toxic metals in the body. For example, iron toxicity can contribute to symptoms such as arthritis, high blood pressure, tension headaches, and dizziness. Frontal headaches, PMS, menstrual problems, insomnia, digestive disorders, emotional sensitivity can all be associated with copper toxicity.
Encourage everyone you know to take advantage of this opportunity to use hair mineral analysis to discover the possible underlying reasons why they are not experiencing optimal health.

These diagrams illustrate the benefits and effects of actually knowing what is happening in your body from testing your hair. 'A Healthier You' shows how your health can be improved based on recommendations made from correctly interpreting the test results. Information provided by Test Your Hair's Hair Mineral Analysis tells the story of people's lifestyles, environments, and biochemical individuality.

My siblings and I are putting together a fundraiser for our mother, Diana Leach.

We will be hosting the Hobson's Cure Fundraiser at the Langley Town Hall Pub on December 8th of this year. It's $20.00 CAD a ticket. You get a delicious burger and a house beer plus the great feeling of donating $10 straight to this event!! If you would like to donate silent auction prizes please don’t hesitate to contact us on Facebook.
FACEBOOK LINK: https://www.facebook.com/events/359201680882911/?ref_dashboard_filter=upcoming
We plan to donate all left over money to other breast cancer patients who need help to get these other treatments as well.

An account has been set up at Coast Capital Savings Credit Union. Donations can be made to this account at any of their branches located across the Lower Mainland and Vancouver Island. The account name is under ""Diana Leach in Trust"".
Anything helps, small or large amounts we thank you so much for your time and your donation.

Hobson (affectionate nickname) was first diagnosed with breast cancer about four years ago. She had a double mastectomy then underwent several harsh chemo and radiation treatments. The chemo was so intense that she would be sick in bed for days. There were blisters all inside her mouth and down her throat. She had trouble walking because her feet and hands were so blistered and raw. It was a very rough year but the results were good and we thought we beat it. We had a christmas celebration with all our closest friends and family and thought everything was great. We were starting over. Then she started to get pain in her back.

When the doctors checked, our worst nightmare came true that the cancer metastasized. It had spread into her lungs, ribs, spine, some muscles in her back and more recently into her adrenal glands. Hobson once again underwent several painful radiation treatments and milder chemo treatments. In conjunction with these treatments she has also been taking lots of vitamins and minerals, juicing vegetables with fruits, eating mostly vegan and only organic. She has also been undergoing various other treatments. She starts with a vitamin C treatment twice a week for ($150.00 each time). Additionally she gets localized hyperthermia ($400.00 each time) twice a week and full body hyperthermia ($1000.00 each time) once a month. Hyperthermia is a type of cancer treatment in which body tissue is exposed to high temperatures (up to 113°F) to damage and kill cancer cells. She also receives a Xgeva shot once a month. It is a bone strengthening treatment to help where the cancer has eaten through her ribs and spine. These treatments help to boost Hobson’s immune system
column2: by opening the body’s vessels to assist the chemotherapy so it can penetrate deeper into the cancerous tissues and destroy them. And on top of all this she also has chemotherapy every second thursday. Furthermore Hobson has several pain medications that are also very expensive. We wanted to host this fundraiser to help pay for these treatments.

column1: There is a clinic in Tijuana that creates something called the dendritic cell vaccine. They will take her blood cells and cancer cells to create a vaccine specifically catered for destroying the cancer that is in Hobson’s body. The fundraiser is mainly for this dendritic cell vaccine. Unfortunately it’s not offered in Canada yet. The dendritic cell vaccine is currently only being researched in Canada and the United States. With your help Hobson will be able to get to the hospital in Santa Barbara, California. Once there, she will be driven across the border to Tijuana to start gathering her T cells and cancer cells to create the dendritic cell vaccine. She will be going back and forth because we plan to continue doing all of her other treatments as well.
Thank you again,
Julie, Michelle and Duncan.

Short Summary

A few years ago my intestines ruptured.  Yeah, go figure!
My wife got me to the hospital just in time.  I went from the door to the table quick.
I heard them say, ""He's dying, we got to go now..."".

I didn't die!  They saved my life.
I had a lengthy hospital stay as peritonitis had a grip on me.
I recovered from the ordeal with one exception...

It was not long before I had noticed my teeth were blackening.
The Doc said it was from the diseases and would only become worse.  Great.
Then they began crumbling and falling out within a year.

As a singer/musician/entertainer, this is a hard blow.

My Name is Leo.
I am a Veteran, home owner, taxpayer.
Served on the Board of Directors of the Boys and Girls Club.
Currently serve as a Precinct Committeeman.
I rebuild computers and bicycles and give them to children without as a hobby.
Married once to the most incredible woman for 24 years and counting.
We have 4 cats
column7:
Mommers, Putt Putt, Nana-banana and Fuzzy Boy!

I suppose what I'm trying to say is that my wife and I are good people,
in a bit of a hard time.  With the Grace of God and the kindness of others, we will surpass this major hurdle.

Thank you in advance for your consideration and your generosity.






What We Need &
column8:
What You Get 

Well...I need teeth!  The ultimate would be implants, but that is a luxury. I only need the essential.  The remaining teeth will have to be removed and a set of dentures made.  Several will require an oral surgeon.  I am going to Affordable Dentures for the remaining extractions and dentures...

Approx. 2000. for Oral surgery/Anesthesiologist. (Dr. Jay Cagata, Cape Coral)
Approx. 3000. for the remaining extractions and denture set.

I had a hard time trying to think of some perks, but I have a few really cool ones!

Watch my ""update"" video for a quick demonstration!


A signed copy of my latest original CD, ""Pound of Life"".

column1:
A custom Circuit Bent Atari Punk Console!

A custom Circuit Bent Phreaky Phun Phone!


A complete original recorded song mentioning your name and thanking you personally!*

*Delivery time is subject!   It's a creative process!   And depending on the state of affairs in my mouth.  I do not expect delay, I already have some ideas floating around in my head.   If needed, I have friends with great vocal talent to call on to do the vocal tracks!

The Impact

Wow.  What can I say?  To be pain free and healthy again, that is quite an impact.
To be able to continue working in my career is quite an impact.  To be free of this distracting constant pain and discomfort and move on with life
column2:
impact.  Life changing impact.
But the impact is farther and deeper than that.  There is something deeper going on within this platform.  It affects each and every one of us.  It is very human.  And we are all the better for it.  People are awesome.

Other Ways You Can Help

I'm what is known as a social media moron!
I do not know a tweet from a shout!  But I can play and sing Twist and Shout!
I'd really appreciate your help in Twitting...or Facing Book my plight!
Make it go virus or something!   :-)
","Short SummaryA few years ago my intestines ruptured.  Yeah, go figure!My wife got me to the hospital just in time.  I went from the door to the table quick.I heard them say, ""He's dying, we got to go now..."".I didn't die!  They saved my life.I had a lengthy hospital stay as peritonitis had a grip on me.I recovered from the ordeal with one exception...It was not long before I had noticed my teeth were blackening.The Doc said it was from the diseases and would only become worse.  Great.Then they began crumbling and falling out within a year.As a singer/musician/entertainer, this is a hard blow. My Name is Leo.I am a Veteran, home owner, taxpayer.Served on the Board of Directors of the Boys and Girls Club.Currently serve as a Precinct Committeeman.I rebuild computers and bicycles and give them to children without as a hobby.Married once to the most incredible woman for 24 years and counting.We have 4 cats
column3: Mommers, Putt Putt, Nana-banana and Fuzzy Boy!I suppose what I'm trying to say is that my wife and I are good people,in a bit of a hard time.  With the Grace of God and the kindness of others, we will surpass this major hurdle.Thank you in advance for your consideration and your generosity.What We Need & What You Get  Well...I need teeth!  The ultimate would be implants, but that is a luxury. I only need the essential.  The remaining teeth will have to be removed and a set of dentures made.  Several will require an oral surgeon.  I am going to Affordable Dentures for the remaining extractions and dentures...Approx. 2000. for Oral surgery/Anesthesiologist. (Dr. Jay Cagata, Cape Coral)Approx. 3000. for the remaining extractions and denture set.I had a hard time trying to think of some perks, but I have a few really cool ones!Watch my ""update"" video for a quick demonstration!A signed copy of my latest original CD, ""Pound of Life"".Pound of Life

0,"
On January 6, 2014 my husband of almost 7 years, Jack
“Grumpy” Phillips III went to the E.R. with abdominal pain. They performed a
Cat Scan (CT) and found a perforated bowel due to his diverticulitis. He was
transferred to the sister hospital that had surgeons on call 24/7. He was in
ICU for the first few days and a drainage tube was placed in his abdomen along
with a Nasal Tube. Those along with antibiotics had the surgeon hoping to be
able to perform laparoscopic surgery to repair the damage. After a week in the
hospital on January 13<sup>th</sup> another CT was performed. The surgeon was still
hopeful, but said the worse case would be him doing the “big cut” and having to
perform a colostomy. 4 hours after my husband went into surgery the surgeon
came out and said my husband had a colostomy, a lot of diverticulitis was still
visible in his colon and he said in a few months he would want to go back in
and remove the rest of the diverticulitis and hopefully reverse the colostomy.
Due to my husband having colon cancer in 1996, the reversal may not be

possible.

We are asking for help with the current and ongoing medical bills. We
have insurance through his work, but since he is out of work for an
undetermined amount of time, the premiums have to be paid directly to his work
and of course the co-insurance and deductibles have to be paid as well. We

appreciate and are grateful for any help we can receive. 

Thank you for taking
the time to read this over. If you are unable to help financially that is
alright, please keep him and our family in your thoughts and prayers.

0,"
<h3>I was always told by dentists that I 'need' braces because of a few crooked teeth.  I never took
them seriously.  They just want to make a bunch of money off me, right?  How important is it to have pretty teeth,
really?  So, obviously I never bothered, until now.  I was recently
shown an x-ray of my TMJ joint (where the bottom jaw meets the top jaw).  I saw that about 30% of the
bone (that used to make the joint) is just gone!  No one had ever
mentioned that my crowded teeth could cause damage to my jaw!

It was explained that the uneven crowding of my teeth was putting extra pressure on one side of my jaw, causing the bones to grind together when ever I move my jaw.   I will never be able to repair the existing damage, but braces can relieve the pressure and stop more damage from happening.  I opted to get the cheapest, most uncomfortable braces available, but the bill will still be over $6,000 in total.

I don't expect anyone would be into paying for my braces and appliances (I don't really know what these are, and they sound painful.  The dentist says that they are needed to make the braces work properly).  I am hoping that I can find a lot of people who are willing to put a couple dollars to help.  Maybe find someone that is willing to pay for me to be in pain for a couple years?  (I won't be offended if that is your reason for donating)

Obviously loosing some of the bone in my jaw can cause issues any time the jaw is used.  Until my treatment is completed, this will also continue to cause more damage.  Unfortunately, I live in an area where most employers are call centers.  Basically, I talk for a living and this means I make the damage worst, just by going to work.  If I don't stop the damage, I will eventually be unable to work (talk) or chew.

I don't have the best job, it pays a bit above minimum wage, and has no health/dental benefits.  I am willing to cut out every unnecessary expense to pay for as much of the braces as possible, but I don't think I can do it alone.  Every dollar helps get me closer to paying for the braces.

Some day I hope to start a family and I want to be able to speak to my child/children (maybe grandchildren someday) and enjoy a normal meal with them and not be in pain or have a jaw that gets locked open.

I would like to thank everyone that can give (even if it is just a dollar) or can spread the word to others.  I understand if you don't have extra money to help me, but helping me find others to help is just as important!  A moment of your time and energy can be worth the world to me. Thank you all!

Hi everyone!
<div>
In February 2011, I partook rescuing a four week old pup who was being held out in the palm of a strange man hands in 20 degree weather!
Now 11 month old pit bull boxer mix, one of the sweetest, affectionate, loyal dogs I have ever met!
December 8th, 2012 she had emergency surgery that saved her life!
She is currently on the road to recovery!
I am asking for donations to help cover her emergency hospital visit, and help her heal and have a long healthy life!
No one ever plans on bad things to happen to them, or the ones they love! We all hope for the best, but the unexpected always happens!
I did what I had to in order for my best friend to survive! I will never regret it!!
Thank you for your time, and your participation,
<div>Megan &amp

What we are about

I started PendoAfrica with a passion to make a difference in the lives of girls in the society.  We inspire and mentor all girls to be upright, smart, strong and God-fearing through a network of local organizations in Kenya and Africa.

Inspiring and mentoring everyone around us should be an everyday thing. I believe that God has placed us in various places to make a difference, no matter how small or big an impact. Encouraging one does person makes a difference!

The Girl Study Baby Sleep drive will help the the girls study and focus on their school work without missing a few days of school when they are on their period. It will also help the babies get better sleep. Diapers will keep them comfortable.
<div>
What We Need
All we need is sanitary towels and diapers. It will be my joy if we are able to supply these babies and girls with sanitary towels and diapers for six months.
<div>
The Impact
The diapers will benefit Kids Home International while the sanitary towels will be distributed among a few selected needy girls in a couple of high schools in Kericho.
A pack of sanitary towels costs about $5 that will last a student 5 months.
A pack of 64 disposable diapers cost about $15 that will last for about 5 days.
This online campaign is specifically for anyone who would like to buy a diaper or sanitary towel pack to support this cause.
Other Ways You Can Help
Please help get the word out there. Share this with your friends on facebook and twitter.
Thank you so much for taking your time to be part of this. God bless you!

Faith.

Short Summary

East Carolina Massage, LLC is a new business  with a unique business model not used before in Massage Therapy practice (to our knowledge).   The worker keeps 100% of the money they make from their customers.  The customer pays an affordable rate for therapeutic massage.  We don't do scrubs, body treatments, or any other 'frilly' stuff you can get at any spa...we focus on pain management and therapeutic work only.

column1: What We Need &
column2: What You GetWe need $10,000 to cover 3 months of operational costs while we build this business.  If you donate at least $100 you get a free massage from Ben Cashion LMBT 6377!!   If you can't donate $100, any amount will do!! We  hope to open the business shortly after the school year begins in 2014.  This unique massage therapy clinic will focus solely on therapeutic bodywork and will be the only facility in this area open 7 days a week.

column1:
The Impact

Ben Cashion LMBT 6377 has been a licensed massage therapist for over 8 years.  He has seen many therapists move from job to job because of unfair business practices that require the therapist to pay not only a monthly rental fee but also a portion of their earnings to the practice.  We want our therapists to join our practice and stay! 

Many people have issues with pain management due to injury and illness that can cause them to lose time from work, miss out on activities they enjoy, become addicted to prescription medications or result in last resort surgery that at times does not work.  We will strive to break this cycle by providing therapeutic massage services by licensed and insured professionals who focus on the needs of our clients.  Ben Cashion LMBT 6377 has taught massage therapy at an accredited massage therapy school in eastern NC for three years and will continue to teach our therapists ways to alleviate pain and stress from which our clients suffer.

What happens if we don't raise the entire $10K you ask?  Well, every little bit helps and we are also seeking funds from the rural economic development center and small city grants so whatever we make here will be added to any other funds from other sources.  Of course none of it is a guarantee which is why we need your help!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able to donate at this time, please spread the word about East Carolina Massage and encourage others to contribute AND/OR, once we open our doors, please come see us!  We invite you to experience a new kind of massage therapy practice!

Healing Hard with Ashlei
Her fight with NH Lymphoma
This page is put together by Ashlei's closest friends and supporter. Within it
you will find information from us as well as her. This is her magical journey
to healing hard. We ask that you please not directly contact Ashlei, if you
would like more status updates she has a blog that will be updated as regularly
as she can. WWW.HEALINGHARD.COM
Our incredibly ambitious friend and mentor, Ashlei Yatron, is a role model for
countless young women and is constantly investing her time in sharing her
secret to success, spiritual happiness, and self-love.
Ashlei is that friend who you can confide your deepest secrets and problems to,
and though she has a reputation for exhibiting ""tough love,"" she will
stop at nothing to get you out of a pinch and I promise she will have you
laughing hysterically, even on your worst day.
Although often invested in the detailed trials and tribulations of people she
loves, Ashlei is extremely private about her own personal life. She is so elusive,
that on several occasions, her friends and family have suspected her of working
with an undercover intelligence operation.
As she is someone so independent and private, many do not know that Ashlei has
been diagnosed with NH Lymphoma and is undergoing radiation treatment five days
a week. She is completely unable to work and has had to abandon over a dozen
beloved clients and businesses that rely on her daily. Her medical condition is
uncomfortably forcing her to focus on herself more than ever, and we owe it to
her to give back all the energy, strength, emotional and financial support that
she has given us over the years.
Ashlei at this time is in need of our support and help.
We are estimating somewhere around 50k and growing is needing to be raised to
help support her during this time and to ensure all of her needs and medical
bills are taken care of. Ashlei has also expressed her desire to make sure that
she shares her story and helps others in this position.
This fundraiser is being ran through a Non Profit so Perk for those of you generous donors, It is  A TAX WRITE OFF.

If you would like to mail a check to us so that we do not get a fee from website you can do so to the address below... Please address them to "" Together In Need"" and add a note with your email address so that we can email you your tax form.
Ashlei, 31858 Castaic road suite 102 , Castaic CA 91384
The Impact
<span>As
a small child I had a will to fight so deep that no one could understand, a
drive so strong that it scared others. Over my life I have been taught many
things and one of them was to never give up one was also that your life is
private. I was someone who thought as being a healthy good person this was not
something that would affect me. I had a tumor develop and being unsure what it
was had it looked into, 3 times I was confirmed it was not cancer so we
scheduled surgery to take it out. It was that day June 20th my life would
change forever. After a ruff week after surgery I went in for my appointment,
for a few weeks I was told what it could be and given more fear and not
answered questions than comfort. Still in my head there was no way... I had
been told 3 times it wasn't, this has to be a weird fluke. Until that day I
walked in for my appointment for the news i thought would be a negative was the
day my walls crumbled around me. I held it together like the brick house I am,
until I got in my car and wept. I’m 24, I’m healthy how could this happen?
Through the next few weeks’ things progressed and appointments gathered. Exhausted
and worn out I didn't know who to talk to, who could I tell? Who could I let
know this. My fears of people’s reactions, being treated different, peoples
concern. I quickly realized through the guidance of support this is not
something you can do on your own. Although we may not want to ask for help we
sometimes must. I broke, I sat down and thought and thought and consulted
others. I came to the realization that this is nothing to hide. I am going to
be ok, my job here on this earth is to share, to educate and to help others.
The truth is I need help and support from those around me and that it is in
every aspect. Although every day is different during this process I want my
journey to be the magic in someone else’s and the strength for them to get
through it. I am forever grateful for the support I have received and continue
to receive to those around me. The ones I know and the strangers I can only
hope to know.
Other Ways You Can Help
<span>if
you cannot financially help, we ask that you please help in any way possible.
Getting the word out, Please share with everyone you know and on all social
media outlets you have. There is a share tool built into this site!
Ashlei is very spiritual and outdoorsy, she loves food, comfort, flowers,
crystals, warmth and all things outdoors. If you would like to send her
something to make her smile or help in her journey there is a mailing address
setup for that
Ashlei, 31858 Castaic road suite 102 , Castaic CA 91384
Thank you!
Please share this with page with your family &amp
appreciate
your support. Please keep her in your prayers.
Feel free to send a message through the ""Comments "" at the top of this page!

until I got in my car and wept. I’m 24, I’m healthy how could this happen?
Through the next few weeks’ things progressed and appointments gathered. Exhausted
and worn out I didn't know who to talk to, who could I tell? Who could I let
know this. My fears of people’s reactions, being treated different, peoples
concern. I quickly realized through the guidance of support this is not
something you can do on your own. Although we may not want to ask for help we
sometimes must. I broke, I sat down and thought and thought and consulted
others. I came to the realization that this is nothing to hide. I am going to
be ok, my job here on this earth is to share, to educate and to help others.
The truth is I need help and support from those around me and that it is in
every aspect. Although every day is different during this process I want my
journey to be the magic in someone else’s and the strength for them to get
through it. I am forever grateful for the support I have received and continue
to receive to those around me. The ones I know and the strangers I can only
hope to know.
Other Ways You Can Help
if
you cannot financially help, we ask that you please help in any way possible.
Getting the word out, Please share with everyone you know and on all social
media outlets you have. There is a share tool built into this site!
Ashlei is very spiritual and outdoorsy, she loves food, comfort, flowers,
crystals, warmth and all things outdoors. If you would like to send her
something to make her smile or help in her journey there is a mailing address
setup for that
Ashlei, 31858 Castaic road suite 102 , Castaic CA 91384
Thank you!
Please share this with page with your family & friends!We
appreciate
your support. Please keep her in your prayers.
Feel free to send a message through the ""Comments "" at the top of this page!",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

Cliff is 27, has an associates in business, and he's my fiancee. 
He had recently gotten a job that would have paid all of our bills, for a better place to live, and for our wedding that was planned for August of this year. 
Unfortunately, he had been experiencing back pain that kept getting worse. One day at his new job it was too much to handle, and he couldn't sit without being in severe pain. We took him to a prompt care, they said it was a UTI and gave him amoxicillin.
We took him to his doctor a week later when the symptoms were still there, and she said he had an STI. [Which he didn't, he didn't have any of these things.]
So then another week later, still unable to work and still not making money, he finally got an appointment with a Urologist. He said he had a hernia, but didn't know why it was causing back pain. We had to wait another solid week to see a general surgeon for hernias and he figured out that Cliff has two! then he said that the back pain is completely unrelated, and he has to get his back figured out. It took us another two weeks of xrays, CT scans, and and MRI to find out Cliff has a herniated disc, so severe that the Neurosurgeon was shocked Cliff could still move at all. He told us Cliff needs surgery on April 18th to fix it and he'll be out of work for 4 months after. If he doesn't get it fixed, he'll lose control of his legs and bladder. During that time, or possibly after, he'll also have to have both hernias repaired. 
Because of this, and because I alone can't make enough money to support us, we're forced to quit our jobs and move 4 hours up north to live with Cliff's parents. We have a dog, Moose, and a cat named Moka, so we're forced to go somewhere that we can have room for them. The only place we can do that, is his parents'.

He also can't collect disability, because this won't last more than a year, and he can't collect unemployment because his job won't fire him. 
He also doesn't get anything through his job because he hasn't been there long enough. 

And to top all of it off, we had to cancel the wedding. 
I hate asking for help, but if anything can helps us pay for all of these pricey operations and office visits, along with the debt and bills we already have, I can't pass that up. 
We don't want to leave our friends, and even if we can't stay 
We may be able to return sooner. 

**also the weeks in between going to these appointments wasn't our doing, that's just what it's like trying to get appointments anymore. Doctors tend to be in one office two days a week, and another the rest.

Hydracol is a trusted company with an establish loyal following
help us build our brand.
My name
is Emma Grojnowski and I am the founder and creator of Hydracol.
I have been
in the Beauty Industry for over 17 years. I've and operated one of Sydney's
leading and multiple award winning Skin Care Clinics for over 14 years. The

past 7 years I have devoted all my time and energy into developing Hydracol. 

Hydracol is an anti ageing skin care range that focuses on Vitamin infusions
and Anti Ageing serums that give instant and effective results.
100% Natural Ingredients with an Innovative Formula that Rejuvenates
Ageing Skin and Regenerates Your Skin Cells
Our
Collagen Masks are highly absorbent. They don’t just stay on your skin surface.
Our formula uses only Pure Marine Based Collagen that is absorbed into the skin
at the deep cellular level providing at least 10X the absorption of regular
masks. All 100% natural and derived from a composition that matches very
closely that of the human skin.
We
provide the highest quality Vitamins and Collagen Infusions for the greatest
results in a very short period of time. Scarring, Sun Damage, Fine Lines and
Wrinkles can be kissed goodbye. Hydracol products will restore your youthful
and glowing skin.
Meet the Hydracol Serums that are Changing History!
After
studies and intensive research, we created innovative serum formulas designed for everyday use and for those
concerned with Ageing, Sun Damage, and Dehydration.
Hydracol's
Hydra C Serum has sold over 40,000 units. It’s one of our most appreciated
products because it works efficiently and results can be seen almost
immediately. Using the Hydra C Serum in a balanced skin care routine can do
wonders thanks to its super powerful Anti-Ageing qualities and its high 30%
Vitamin C content.
Help Us
Launch our new groundbreaking products including Hydracol’s Hydra C PLUS Serum, the Revolutionary Formula that will
change the beauty industry forever
If you
stopped loving your skin because of Sun Damage, Fine Lines, Pigmentation, Acne,
Stretch Marks, Scarring and Wrinkles, then Hydracol's Hydra C PLUS is the
product you have been waiting for.
Our new Hydra C PLUS innovative formula contains Kiwi extracts, which are known to
be rich in Vitamin C, Amino Acids, Fruit Acids and Collagen. It also contains
Furelic Acid, an ingredient useful in the removal of scar tissue, and for
reducing the pigmentation of the skin. This wonderful product also has Mino
Ascorbyl Phosphate as an ingredient, a product of Vitamin C, which assists the
amino acid metabolism and repairs skin damaged by acne and pigmentation.
In the past 7
years we have invested all our profits in the formulas, tests and research in order to
be able to offer men and women more innovative products that will make them fall in
love with their skin once again.
We’re
ready to repay you for your help with some of our most appreciated Skin Care
products. Please check the listed offers and select the one you’d like to
receive.
Support Our Campaign Any Way You Can!
● Pass on the link of this campaign
to your friends that are looking for 100% natural Anti Ageing products that
deliver great results.
● Select one of the
thank-you-packages we’re offering as a gift for one of your friends and loved
ones. That way you’ll offer your friend great Hydracol skin care products that
will deliver instant results and you’ll also support us to launch Hydra C plus.
● Link this campaign in one of your
blog posts or share it on your Facebook page.
● E-mail us and share with us your
feedback on how to improve our website so we’ll be able to reach more people.
We are
looking to raise $25,000.  The funds we
receive for this campaign will go straight to developing and increasing the
Hydracol Skin Care Range.
We need
your help to launch our new products, We still need to patent the Hydra C PLUS formula and buy the serum’s
ingredients for the first serum batch. The remaining funds will go to marketing
and help us produce new products in developing.
What
happens if we don't reach our goal? The money raised will be split between our
production run and spreading the word about our Hydracol products. The revenue
generated from those sales will be used to fund Hydra C PLUS first, and then
the rest of our range..
All

perks will be honored whether we reach our goal or not.



Our Flagship Product, hydra C has already sold over 40,000
units worldwide

Perks

As our way of saying 'thank you', we've put together a variety of perks to match every level of contribution. 

          

                                      


Stretch Goals

$25,000 - We will start the production of Hydra C PLUS immediately

$50,000 - We will develop our Collagen Firming Cleanser and Hydra Gold PLUS

$75,000 - We will develop an additional 30 Gel Polish Colours for our Hydra Gel Range

$100,000 - We will develop our Body and Weightloss Range

our customers are saying:

i have been using Hydra C for a few months now, i love it, my skin skin texture has changed and i feel my skin has a really hydrated glow. glow. 

Leonie L- 33yrs - Dublin

I use Hydra C during the day and Hydra Gold at night. My skin feels great, i hope to purchase a roller in the next month.

Jazi K - 23yrs - Florida

My name is Alexia
column2:
I am 43 years old and have been worried about my skin for about 5 years now. I started using the 0.5mm Roller with my Hydra C  3 weeks ago and I am amazed with the results. Thank you so much and I will be back for more very soon.

Alexia E – 43yrs - Sydney

Thanks you so much for a true miracle, I am still in disbelief! My scalp has been balding and it was really depressing me, after a month of using the 0.20 roller along with Minoxidil 5% I am starting to grow my hair back. All my balding friends will be in touch soon.

Paul A – 35yrs - Sydney

I have had 3 children and my stretchmark’s on my tummy looks pretty awful. My youngest is now 11 so I thought it was time I started to look after myself. I must say I did take a little longer than I thought it would (4.5 months) but I am so thrilled with the results, I really can’t believe how good it looks. I used a mixture of needle lengths after some amazing advice from you. Thanks for all your help.

Emma B – 44yrs – LA

I have been using your roller on and off for about a year now, I still miss the fact you stop doing facials Wah. Thanks so much for being there, I love the fact I can still send you a skin care question and you will always answer it very quickly. I love my roller, it’s because of this roller I don’t feel like I need to see a therapist often, the results are great and the price makes it so easy to keep up this homecare. PLEASE let me know if you start doing treatments again, I want to be your first client.

Leisa F – 32yrs - Singapore

Hydracol Masks Rule, I have tried many and these are by far the very best. I use them weekly and my skin feels great,

Maggie L – 48 – New Zealand

What amazing customer service, firstly postage was soooooooooooo quick, secondly the quality of all your products are amazing ( I have bought several things from your store) and thirdly the results are really 5 stars.

I recently bought your combination Masks and Roller, this is my 3rd order of Masks I have bought from you and the results are amazing, my friends keep coming over to use them, I have now given them your store. The roller I recently bought is great
column3:
it works so well with my Hydra Gold and Vitamin A Serum. My wrinkles on my forehead and around my eyes are improving a lot. My skin is also alot smoother and my pigmentation is starting to fade.

Lydia R – 38 – Adelaide

Thanks for all your amazing customer service
column4:
I am so excited about using the roller, I have tried everything for my cellulite and nothing has worked. I have used the roller for just a couple weeks, I am religious about using it daily and I am so happy with the results so far. You have been amazing with my many questions, thanks for your patience.

Ruby L – 24yrs - Illinois

I have just purchased your Hydra Gold, it is such a beautiful serum, my skin skin feels so soft and even my husband says i have a glow. I have used your wonderful Hydracol masks before and i just wanted to tell you how much i love them. I also wanted to thank you you for such fast delivery.

Katie Z - 43yrs - UK

Great products, i have been using your skin roller with the Hydrad Gold and Vitamin A Serum and I have noticed a reduction in my scarring and my skin hydration has improved alot. Thanks for such great products.

Leanne L - 34yrs - Queensland

My stretchmarks have almost gone, i am in love with your rollers

Jaimee O - 46yrs - Russia

I have been using you masks weekly for the past 2 months, my fine lines have faded and my skin looks much more healthy. I am so glad you opened up an ebay store as it makes it so much easier to top up my stash of masks

0,"
southern girl living a really nice Arizona life. I grew up dancing and wearing
tights and toe shoes and not once did I ever think it would take almost dying
to lead me to handcrafting natural body care products. But, in 2006 I got
extremely ill with a near fatal case of Valley Fever.  After about 18
months in and out of the hospital, I was discharged and when I got home I had
to take 17 different medications every day.  Those medications were so
strong they killed everything in my body, the good stuff and the Valley Fever.
I survived the brain legions and the fungus in my lungs but I was left with
horribly damaged skin.
column3: >Have you ever had sunburn so bad

column1: that your skin blistered, cracked and peeled?  Have you ever gotten poison
ivy and with the itchy little blisters?  Imagine a combination of both of
those! Medication didn't
column2: > heal my skin and I wound up with dry, scaly skin that

column1: often bled when I scratched. I didn't
column2: > even get relief with the 2 ounce, $50+

column1: lotions and creams that were recommended for me to use. I realized I would have
to find my own solution and I learned to make body care products.
column9: >Learning to make lotion let loose my

column1: “mad scientist” alter ego! I learned about the properties and benefits of
natural ingredients, like oils and butters and I formulated my first lotion.
When I used my natural ingredient based lotion, there was a HUGE difference
with my skin. My skin that had flaked like dandruff and often bled, soon healed
and there were very few indications there was ever any damage.  After a
while no one could tell that I had been so sick or that my skin had been so
badly damaged.  My family and friends noticed the changes in my healed
skin and they began to actually pay for what I made.
column9: >What began as a need to heal my

column1: damaged skin became a vision that has now transformed into
Natural Body Care Apothecary
available at
With so many people taking the time
and paying attention to what we put into our bodies to keep us healthy,
shouldn't we take time to also think about and use good products we put ONTO our
bodies? YES! We should!  Just like we take vitamins to care for ourselves
from the inside, we can take care and savour, the largest organ of our bodies,
our skin, from the OUTSIDE IN.
begins with me having a need to be met.  Personally, I needed natural
ingredients that are known to heal and restore dry, damaged skin.  For my
first lotion, I used coconut oil and cocoa butter.
<li>
<span style=""color: rgb(106, 106, 106)
ingredients to use takes researching their benefits and properties.  When
I develop a formula I take issues like oily skin or an ingredient having a
greasy feel is taken into careful consideration.  The goal, again, is to
meet a need with the product made.
<li>
<span style=""color: rgb(106, 106, 106)
developed so that the products are made in small batches of 8-10 containers
each. Small batches help me maintain the quality of the products I make.
<li>
<span style=""color: rgb(106, 106, 106)
use big, factory sized machines to make their
products are handmade by me. I take the time to specifically weigh the
ingredients, heat them to their specific heat points and mix them
together.  When the batch is cool enough, I dispense the
savour"" into containers and then label them.

industry?

this business.  Here are a few facts

column5: >SweetSavours Natural Body Care Apothecary

column1: Another important fact is that small
businesses were the foundation of this country and other countries worldwide. Especially
now, small businesses are key parts of our economies, locally, country and around
the world. Though SweetSavours is small, it has the opportunity to have an
impact especially within the local economy. This business will provide a good
source for natural body care products to people to use and in the upcoming
future may provide employment opportunities. Now is the time to make my vision
a reality and I've set new goals to get there.
Body Care Apothecary will launch its line of products that will
include enhanced formulations of the current body care, lip care, hand care, and foot care products.
These 10 products will be handmade by ME!
2. SweetSavours
will make its public debut and take its place within the local market on
November 29, 2014 at the <b>Phoenix Public
Market in Phoenix, AZ.
3. SweetSavours will
increase its local and online marketing to make SweetSavours and
its products known. People need to be told what’s available. Having
products to sell and a market and online store from which to sell them isn’t
enough.
early on that I can’t do this all by myself. I am asking for you to make a
contribution that will help SweetSavours' grow.  That's the benefit of Indiegogo and crowdfunding.  Those who choose to can help this small business grow.

<span style=""color: rgb(106, 106, 106)
","Hi! I’m Sherri.  I was a
southern girl living a really nice Arizona life. I grew up dancing and wearing
tights and toe shoes and not once did I ever think it would take almost dying
to lead me to handcrafting natural body care products. But, in 2006 I got
extremely ill with a near fatal case of Valley Fever.  After about 18
months in and out of the hospital, I was discharged and when I got home I had
to take 17 different medications every day.  Those medications were so
strong they killed everything in my body, the good stuff and the Valley Fever.
I survived the brain legions and the fungus in my lungs but I was left with
horribly damaged skin.                       Have you ever had sunburn so bad
that your skin blistered, cracked and peeled?  Have you ever gotten poison
ivy and with the itchy little blisters?  Imagine a combination of both of
those! Medication didn't heal my skin and I wound up with dry, scaly skin that
often bled when I scratched. I didn't even get relief with the 2 ounce, $50+
lotions and creams that were recommended for me to use. I realized I would have
to find my own solution and I learned to make body care products.                                                               Learning to make lotion let loose my
“mad scientist” alter ego! I learned about the properties and benefits of
natural ingredients, like oils and butters and I formulated my first lotion.
When I used my natural ingredient based lotion, there was a HUGE difference
with my skin. My skin that had flaked like dandruff and often bled, soon healed
and there were very few indications there was ever any damage.  After a
while no one could tell that I had been so sick or that my skin had been so
badly damaged.  My family and friends noticed the changes in my healed
skin and they began to actually pay for what I made.What began as a need to heal my
damaged skin became a vision that has now transformed into SweetSavours
Natural Body Care Apothecary. SweetSavours' products are currently
available at www.etsy.com/shop/sweetsavours.
With so many people taking the time
and paying attention to what we put into our bodies to keep us healthy,
shouldn't we take time to also think about and use good products we put ONTO our
bodies? YES! We should!  Just like we take vitamins to care for ourselves
from the inside, we can take care and savour, the largest organ of our bodies,
our skin, from the OUTSIDE IN.
The process
begins with me having a need to be met.  Personally, I needed natural
ingredients that are known to heal and restore dry, damaged skin.  For my
first lotion, I used coconut oil and cocoa butter.
Knowing what
ingredients to use takes researching their benefits and properties.  When
I develop a formula I take issues like oily skin or an ingredient having a
greasy feel is taken into careful consideration.  The goal, again, is to
meet a need with the product made.
Each formula is
developed so that the products are made in small batches of 8-10 containers
each. Small batches help me maintain the quality of the products I make.
Many companies
use big, factory sized machines to make their products.  SweetSavours
products are handmade by me. I take the time to specifically weigh the
ingredients, heat them to their specific heat points and mix them
together.  When the batch is cool enough, I dispense the
savour"" into containers and then label them.
I would like to see SweetSavours become a strong small business that provides natural, cost effective body care products to people. A
product that is made with a skin care need in mind.
What's happening with the body care
industry?
When I began to consider starting
this business, I did some research about the body care industry. When I saw
some of the basic facts, I saw a need that SweetSavours can fill.  This helped fuel the passion for starting
this business.  Here are a few facts
about the current body care industry:
The industry makes about $70 billion
dollars every year worldwide.
Of $70+, less that $2 billion is
made here in the USA.
About 1% are small businesses,
like SweetSavours Natural Body Care Apothecary
Another important fact is that small
businesses were the foundation of this country and other countries worldwide. Especially
now, small businesses are key parts of our economies, locally, country and around
the world. Though SweetSavours is small, it has the opportunity to have an
impact especially within the local economy. This business will provide a good
source for natural body care products to people to use and in the upcoming
future may provide employment opportunities. Now is the time to make my vision
a reality and I've set new goals to get there.     1. SweetSavours Natural
Body Care Apothecary will launch its line of products that will
include enhanced formulations of the current body care, lip care, hand care, and foot care products.
These 10 products will be handmade by ME!
2. SweetSavours
will make its public debut and take its place within the local market on
November 29, 2014 at the Phoenix Public
Market in Phoenix, AZ.
3. SweetSavours will
increase its local and online marketing to make SweetSavours and
its products known. People need to be told what’s available. Having
products to sell and a market and online store from which to sell them isn’t
enough.               I realized
early on that I can’t do this all by myself. I am asking for you to make a

contribution that will help SweetSavours' grow.  That's the benefit of Indiegogo and crowdfunding.  Those who choose to can help this small business grow.                                                      Your contribution will help make the vision of
SweetSavours Natural Body Care Apothecary become a REALITY!

Due to the current verbal agreement I have with her, I'm quickly going into debt and can't pay lawyer retainer fees.

We separated a long time ago, and things have been ok up until about 6 months ago. Things are starting to get ugly, and I don't want that to happen. The longer this takes, the worse it is inevitable to become. The last thing I want is for some crazy custody battle that I certainly can't afford.

Hi, my name is Ricardo I am a T3 paraplegic, who is in the middle of going through physical therapy so I can try and live a normal life! I was in a car accident 9 years ago which left me paralyzed from the chest down and for the 1st 7+ years I was in a deep depression but I decided 2 years ago to snap out of it. In January of 2012 I was 400+ pounds and waiting to die but all of a sudden something snapped inside me I chose to live! I lost most of the weight as I write this I'm about 290 pounds and I'm going through physical therapy so hopefully I can get in and out of  wheelchair on my own. Unfortunately funding is about to run out with my insurance and it wont pick up again until 2015. If I stop now I will have lost all the progress I've
column5:
>made and will go back to laying in bed everyday and just miss out on starting a life. So I'm asking you if you're reading and watching this please donate to my cause and help me get back my life. If you can't donate please share my story and spread the word out! Thank you for taking the time to read and watch this. Bless you all. :)

","Hi, my name is Ricardo I am a T3 paraplegic, who is in the middle of going through physical therapy so I can try and live a normal life! I was in a car accident 9 years ago which left me paralyzed from the chest down and for the 1st 7+ years I was in a deep depression but I decided 2 years ago to snap out of it. In January of 2012 I was 400+ pounds and waiting to die but all of a sudden something snapped inside me I chose to live! I lost most of the weight as I write this I'm about 290 pounds and I'm going through physical therapy so hopefully I can get in and out of  wheelchair on my own. Unfortunately funding is about to run out with my insurance and it wont pick up again until 2015. If I stop now I will have lost all the progress I've made and will go back to laying in bed everyday and just miss out on starting a life. So I'm asking you if you're reading and watching this please donate to my cause and help me get back my life. If you can't donate please share my story and spread the word out! Thank you for taking the time to read and watch this. Bless you all. :)",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1: |","Houston, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/help-ricardo-get-his-life-back/pica

Short Summary
• Hi! I'm Sonia Dhaliwal! I'm passionate learning about  the Vedic culture.
• Alot of yoga nowadays isn't teaching the correct Vedic origins, and
instructors have little knowledge where it actually originated from!
<li>I
want to end all that, I want to learn from an Enlightened living Master
here in India, and help spread it all over the world!
• I want to become a yoga instructor.
What I Need

• I will be going to Nithya Yoga in Bidadi, South India to this program- http://nithyayoga.com/ which costs $3000 to attend. 
  • Paramahamsa Nithyananda is a spiritual genius who has written over 500 books, and has hundreds of centers throughout the world. He has been featured in Watkin's magazine, and cured me of a rare disease. I will be learning with him the authentic Vedic origins of Yoga, and help spread that around, revolutionizing the field of yoga, going back to it's Vedic source.

• If I don't reach my goal, this will help fund my second venture, going to a 21 day program in Cambodia with Paramahamsa Nithyanada for an energetically charged life altering experience journeying into the many layers of the soul.
The Impact

• Learning from Paramahamsa Nithyananda is important to me since he's cured me of a rare disease I've had for over ten years, Celiac Disease. Having imbibed his teachings I really feel he is a genius, and really would be amazed to learn from him. If I learn yoga from him, it would not be learning yoga from a regular person, but an enlightened Master who embodies the presence of the Divine. Yoga would be energetically charged, and armed with intense knowledge from India, and help set our modern understanding of yoga right, because it will correctly source the accurate Vedic teachings.

• Having given up journalism- seeing that it tells lies, I want to make a career change. What better thing to take up than what invigorates us, rejuvenates us, gives us not only a healthy body, but a healthy soul! And because of whom it's learned from, help revolutionize the field of yoga!
Risks &

•  I used to have terrible health problems for ten years, which doing yoga was practically impossible for me. I was anemic, fainted often, had brittle bones, and felt terrible is so many ways as this video tells you.
    https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PugGvhPvPe8
    I was cured of that from Paramahamsa Nithyananda. Having an athletic body once again like I used to have before this disease would become a dream for myself! And sharing Yoga as per the authentic version from an Enlightened Being from India with the world will just be incredible!
• In order to realize these goals, I need your help! Please help fund me!
Other Ways You Can Help
• Spread the word! Share this on your Facebook, Youtube, or other forms of social media. Ask around. See if anyone is willing to help!
• Be sure to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Having given up journalism- seeing that it tells lies, I want to make a career change. What better thing to take up than what invigorates us, rejuvenates us, gives us not only a healthy body, but a healthy soul! And because of whom it's learned from, help revolutionize the field of yoga!

<h3 style=""text-align: center
TellSpec's CEO and CTO show a live demo of the TellSpec's food analysis algorithm.
A message from Isabel Hoffmann, TellSpec's CEO:
A message from Dr Stephen Watson, TellSpec's CTO:
TellSpec in the News:

column2: >Mashable | DailyBurn  | UrbanMoms | HeathHabits

column1: Recent news:
NASDAQ TAKES NOTICE of TELLSPEC!

column3: >Many thanks to Remy Blair for her independent review of TellSpec for AoI.

column1: <h1 style=""text-align: center
column4: >Beam up the facts about what’s in

column1: <h1 style=""text-align: center

column2: >You want to know what’s in your food before you buy it, before you order it, and before you eat it - because your health depends on what you eat.

column1: Many foods contain chemicals and allergens that we want to avoid. But it can be difficult to know whether these chemicals and allergens are in your food or not. How can you tell if your food contains the nutrients you need? What about things like sodium, gluten or trans fats that you might be trying to avoid? Food labels can give us some information if they're available, but they are not always intelligible and some ingredients may not even be reported.
We have invented a system called TellSpec combining a spectrometer and a unique algorithm to tell you the allergens, chemicals, nutrients, calories, and ingredients in your food.
What is TellSpec?
TellSpec is a three-part system which includes: (1) a spectrometer scanner (2) an algorithm that exists in the cloud
column2: and (3) an easy-to-understand interface on your smart phone. Just aim the scanner at the food and press the button until it beeps. You can scan directly or through plastic or glass. TellSpec <span style=""line-height: 1.45em
column3: >analyzes the findings using the algorithm and sends a report to your phone telling you the allergens, chemicals, nutrients, calories, and ingredients in the food. TellSpec is a fast, simple, and easy-to-use way to learn what's in your food.
column4: >We need your help to make it smaller and manufacture it as a handheld device.

column1: What will TellSpec do?
TellSpec will identify allergens, chemicals, nutrients, calories, and ingredients in foods or beverages.

column2: >TellSpec will warn you when a food contains allergens such as gluten or egg.

column1: TellSpec will
column2: > track your daily calories and help you achieve your daily targets.
>TellSpec will tell you about inaccurately reported ingredients like trans fats and give you the background story on mysterious ingredients like tartrazine. TellSpec goes beyond the label!
>TellSpec will track what you eat, and based on your reports of how you feel, it will help identify your food sensitivities.
>TellSpec will help you monitor your intake of toxic chemicals such as mercury, so that you will stay within recommended limits.
>TellSpec will track your intake of essential vitamins and minerals, and help you ensure that you are getting the right amount

column1: How will it work?

column2: >Light is made up of particles called photons. When you beam the low-powered laser in the TellSpec scanner at the food, some of the photons are absorbed, raising the energy states of the molecules in the food. Lower energy photons are then reflected back. The spectrometer inside the TellSpec scanner sorts these photons by wavelength and counts them. The resulting numbers, called a spectrum, describe the chemical compounds in the food.

column4: >This spectrum is uploaded to our analysis engine where it is analyzed and correlated with other reference spectra. Information about the allergens, chemicals, nutrients, calories, and ingredients in the food is then downloaded to you and displayed on your smart phone.

column2: >TellSpec responds to your specific food requirements and preferences. TellSpec is a smart system that learns as you use it, so that you see the information that is of most interest to you.

column1:
An SDK for developers and researchers

We believe that the community can develop applications of TellSpec that go beyond our dreams. So we are also developing a software development kit (SDK) that will provide developers with tools for directly accessing the food analysis data from our servers so that they can create their own amazing applications. The SDK includes source code for iPhone and Android apps, an API for TellSpec's analysis engine, JSON specifications for data interchange, and access to information about each nutrient, chemical, allergen, and ingredient.
Global crowdsourcing

The TellSpec food analysis algorithm learns from each scan. So every time you scan, you not only learn about what's in your food, you also help others learn what's in their food. That's why distributing TellSpecs globally, and into the developing world, is so important to us. As the algorithm learns from reference scans from around the world, the analysis everywhere will get better and better.
Our goal is to make this amazing system available to everyone, everywhere
column2: and to encourage others to use our tools to make great things for the good of human health.

column1: What we’re developing
In the video, the device shown is a 3-D model of the future industrial design of the TellSpec scanner.
TellSpec has developed a scanner and a cloud analysis engine.
column2: >These work together to gather a spectrum of your food, analyze that spectrum, and display information about the food on your smart phone.
column3: >We need your help to make it smaller and manufacture it as a handheld device.

column1: The handheld scanner is a Raman spectrometer. The low-powered laser inside the scanner emits coherent light through the front window. Stimulated light from the sample is then collected through a filter in the window that removes the Rayleigh scattered light. The light then passes through a diffraction grating that disperses the light onto a CCD detector. The CCD detector converts the light into an electrical signal that is then digitized and sent to the smart phone over Bluetooth.

The smart phone receives the digital spectrum of the food and transmits it to the TellSpec analysis engine which processes it, compares it to reference spectra, and runs a learning algorithm on it. The output is interpreted through a large database, and information about the food is selected and customized for the user. The smart phone then downloads the information and displays it to the user.

Our designs for the scanner and the user interface are guided by the principle that interested people should be able to use the TellSpec system easily and immediately, without training and without reading a user manual
column2: and they should be able to understand and use the displayed information without an extensive knowledge of food chemistry.

column1: Technical Specifications
We need your help

Until recently, a large and expensive industrial spectrometer would have been needed to gather spectra of adequate resolution and signal strength, but recent developments in miniaturization of optical devices and in nanophotonics have made it possible to manufacture tiny and inexpensive spectrometers. A new and powerful method of analyzing spectra with a learning algorithm has also enabled the use of much weaker signals without loss of accuracy.
Over the past nine months, we've come a long way in the development of TellSpec. We've developed the analysis engine, coded it, and tested it
column2: we've successfully tested three prototype scanners, including one using a nanochip
column3: we've finished the industrial design for the scanner
column4: we're well along with the user interface design
column5: and we've been doing an independent validation of the underlying algorithm.

column1: With your help, we can:
•Manufacture the TellSpec scanner and get all the regulatory approvals needed to ship it.
•Deploy the food analysis engine on servers that reliably provide quick analysis of the spectra.
•Develop the SDK for Android and iOS platforms so others can build exciting apps.
By backing TellSpec, you will be a key part of making this revolutionary technology a reality.
Reward Tiers

Isabel and Stephen are working with a team of industry veterans who are passionate about this innovative new way of analyzing what's in your food. Together, we have experience in creating consumer software, hardware, and services in fields ranging from environmental health and preventive medicine to entertainment and education. Now we're excited to build a healthier world by empowering people to make informed choices about what they eat.

Isabel Hoffmann is CEO and Founder of TellSpec Inc., a biotech company devoted to building a greener and healthier world by empowering people to make informed choices about what they eat. She has a proven track record in leading and scaling early-stage businesses.

In the past 19 years, she has founded eight companies in the fields of health care, genetics, technology, entertainment and education, achieving consolidated revenues of US$75M, business valuations of US$300M, as well as creating 2,300+ jobs in the North American, European and South American markets. She has been working in the field of preventive medicine for the past decade and co-founded two private medical clinics, Vibrance Medical Group in Beverly Hills, USA, and GenoSolutions in Cascais, Portugal.
Isabel has been honoured with Ernst &
column2: Young’s Entrepreneur of the Year Award, Canada's Top 40 under 40 Award, Canada’s National iWAY Award presented by the Canadian Royal Bank and CANARIE Inc., the Women in Technology Award by Bell Mobility, the Canada-America Business Council Award, the University of Toronto’s Alumni of the Year Award, and the Maclean’s Honor Roll for Canadian Excellence.

He has been a tenured full professor of mathematics at York University in Toronto since 1993, and has held visiting positions in 14 countries, authored over a hundred published journal articles, and addressed dozens of international symposia.

column2: >Stephen is an inventor of 48 patents and patent applications in the USA, Europe, and Japan for innovations in encryption systems
column3: media encryption, distribution, synchronization, recognition, and bookmarking
column4: user interfaces for media sales and access
column5: and the analysis of food spectra.

column1: For eight years, Stephen was CTO at Kaleidescape Inc., a consumer electronics company in Sunnyvale, CA, where he developed its powerful IP portfolio and technology, software, and metadata licenses. He led Kaleidescape’s successful copyright litigation strategy and was responsible for its partnership, manufacturing, and sales agreements, and export, regulatory, and tax-compliance tactics and planning.
Please join us
Help us complete our work on TellSpec, and become one of the first to use it to learn about the allergens, chemicals, nutrients, calories, and ingredients in your food.
Back TellSpec – and become part of a revolution, building a healthier world by empowering people to make informed choices.
Please write on our Facebook wall or tweet to let us know what you like best about TellSpec, how you might use it, and features you'd like to see.
Risks and challenges

We are pioneers in this new and exciting technology. Our team has successfully tested prototypes of the TellSpec system and we are moving toward production. We are working to mitigate the risks in volume production and analysis and are positioned to work with partners to execute our delivery plan. We are providing the Indiegogo community with our estimate of when we expect to ship beta and production units of the TellSpec scanners.

Nevertheless, unforeseen challenges may present themselves as we test the optics, build and bring up alpha and beta scanners, deploy the analysis engine on servers, seek certification approvals, release the SDK, and go to manufacturing. We are committed to keeping you informed of our progress in the months following the campaign. In the event that unexpected issues arise in the delivery schedule, we will do our utmost to minimize the impact on our early supporters. We are dedicated to providing you with a great experience.

NASDAQ TAKES NOTICE of TELLSPEC!
Many thanks to Remy Blair for her independent review of TellSpec for AoI.
Beam up the facts about what’s in
your food
You want to know what’s in your food before you buy it, before you order it, and before you eat it - because your health depends on what you eat.

Many foods contain chemicals and allergens that we want to avoid. But it can be difficult to know whether these chemicals and allergens are in your food or not. How can you tell if your food contains the nutrients you need? What about things like sodium, gluten or trans fats that you might be trying to avoid? Food labels can give us some information if they're available, but they are not always intelligible and some ingredients may not even be reported.
We have invented a system called TellSpec combining a spectrometer and a unique algorithm to tell you the allergens, chemicals, nutrients, calories, and ingredients in your food.
What is TellSpec?
TellSpec is a three-part system which includes: (1) a spectrometer scanner (2) an algorithm that exists in the cloud
column2: and (3) an easy-to-understand interface on your smart phone. Just aim the scanner at the food and press the button until it beeps. You can scan directly or through plastic or glass. TellSpec analyzes the findings using the algorithm and sends a report to your phone telling you the allergens, chemicals, nutrients, calories, and ingredients in the food. TellSpec is a fast, simple, and easy-to-use way to learn what's in your food.  We need your help to make it smaller and manufacture it as a handheld device.

column1: What will TellSpec do?
TellSpec will identify allergens, chemicals, nutrients, calories, and ingredients in foods or beverages.
TellSpec will warn you when a food contains allergens such as gluten or egg.
TellSpec will track your daily calories and help you achieve your daily targets.
TellSpec will tell you about inaccurately reported ingredients like trans fats and give you the background story on mysterious ingredients like tartrazine. TellSpec goes beyond the label!
TellSpec will track what you eat, and based on your reports of how you feel, it will help identify your food sensitivities.
TellSpec will help you monitor your intake of toxic chemicals such as mercury, so that you will stay within recommended limits.
TellSpec will track your intake of essential vitamins and minerals, and help you ensure that you are getting the right amount
How will it work?

Light is made up of particles called photons. When you beam the low-powered laser in the TellSpec scanner at the food, some of the photons are absorbed, raising the energy states of the molecules in the food. Lower energy photons are then reflected back. The spectrometer inside the TellSpec scanner sorts these photons by wavelength and counts them. The resulting numbers, called a spectrum, describe the chemical compounds in the food.

This spectrum is uploaded to our analysis engine where it is analyzed and correlated with other reference spectra. Information about the allergens, chemicals, nutrients, calories, and ingredients in the food is then downloaded to you and displayed on your smart phone.
TellSpec responds to your specific food requirements and preferences. TellSpec is a smart system that learns as you use it, so that you see the information that is of most interest to you.

An SDK for developers and researchersWe believe that the community can develop applications of TellSpec that go beyond our dreams. So we are also developing a software development kit (SDK) that will provide developers with tools for directly accessing the food analysis data from our servers so that they can create their own amazing applications. The SDK includes source code for iPhone and Android apps, an API for TellSpec's analysis engine, JSON specifications for data interchange, and access to information about each nutrient, chemical, allergen, and ingredient.
Global crowdsourcing

The TellSpec food analysis algorithm learns from each scan. So every time you scan, you not only learn about what's in your food, you also help others learn what's in their food. That's why distributing TellSpecs globally, and into the developing world, is so important to us. As the algorithm learns from reference scans from around the world, the analysis everywhere will get better and better.
Our goal is to make this amazing system available to everyone, everywhere
column2: and to encourage others to use our tools to make great things for the good of human health.

column1: What we’re developing
In the video, the device shown is a 3-D model of the future industrial design of the TellSpec scanner.

TellSpec has developed a scanner and a cloud analysis engine. These work together to gather a spectrum of your food, analyze that spectrum, and display information about the food on your smart phone. We need your help to make it smaller and manufacture it as a handheld device.

The handheld scanner is a Raman spectrometer. The low-powered laser inside the scanner emits coherent light through the front window. Stimulated light from the sample is then collected through a filter in the window that removes the Rayleigh scattered light. The light then passes through a diffraction grating that disperses the light onto a CCD detector. The CCD detector converts the light into an electrical signal that is then digitized and sent to the smart phone over Bluetooth.

The smart phone receives the digital spectrum of the food and transmits it to the TellSpec analysis engine which processes it, compares it to reference spectra, and runs a learning algorithm on it. The output is interpreted through a large database, and information about the food is selected and customized for the user. The smart phone then downloads the information and displays it to the user.

Our designs for the scanner and the user interface are guided by the principle that interested people should be able to use the TellSpec system easily and immediately, without training and without reading a user manual
column2: and they should be able to understand and use the displayed information without an extensive knowledge of food chemistry.

column1: Technical Specifications
We need your help

Until recently, a large and expensive industrial spectrometer would have been needed to gather spectra of adequate resolution and signal strength, but recent developments in miniaturization of optical devices and in nanophotonics have made it possible to manufacture tiny and inexpensive spectrometers. A new and powerful method of analyzing spectra with a learning algorithm has also enabled the use of much weaker signals without loss of accuracy.
Over the past nine months, we've come a long way in the development of TellSpec. We've developed the analysis engine, coded it, and tested it
column2: we've successfully tested three prototype scanners, including one using a nanochip
column3: we've finished the industrial design for the scanner
column4: we're well along with the user interface design
column5: and we've been doing an independent validation of the underlying algorithm.

column1: With your help, we can:
•Manufacture the TellSpec scanner and get all the regulatory approvals needed to ship it.
•Deploy the food analysis engine on servers that reliably provide quick analysis of the spectra.
•Develop the SDK for Android and iOS platforms so others can build exciting apps.
By backing TellSpec, you will be a key part of making this revolutionary technology a reality.
