SMART PUTTER
column2: >Advanced Trainer and Effective Gamer
column3:
>Solution to your putting

Improving your putting is hard, but it's the key to keeping your score low on the course. The Smart Putter offers you an easy-to-use solution by leveling your putting stroke while helping you keep the proper alignment between the ball, putter, and pin. The Smart Putter is the world's first digital putter that can effectively train you to build and maintain proper muscle memory for your putting stroke. The Smart Putter is not only for the practice green, it's built to be used on the course as well. It's an all-in-one solution to help you score lower and have more FUN on the golf course!

SMART Putter was mentioned in
column6:
>   

1. Keep your stroke smooth and level without ruining your stance.

LED level indicators light up instantly according to the level of the putter. Golfers can check the stability of their putter without ruining their posture.

 

2. Ensure your aim is true and contact square.

The built-in laser aimer lets the golfer know exactly where the putter face is aimed. It can also be used to confirm proper alignment between the putter face, ball and pin. The laser can be turned on and off according to the golfer's preference.

 

3. Easily turn off the LED/Laser indicator for regular use.

With just a little push on the power button located on the head of the putter, you can turn off the LED level indicators and Laser aimer. This allows you to use the Smart Putter as a fully functional traditional putter. The head of the putter was specifically designed to help your putts roll square and true. The Smart Putter offers the functionality of a trainer with the performance of your traditional putter.
column10:
/>

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

4. Analyze your results with our easy-to-use app

Watch your animation move according to your stroke in real-time with the SMARTGOLF App (FREE/available in app stores). Your movement is recorded in our database, allowing you to analyze your stroke in real time. Utilize the precise and accurate stroke tracking data (Angle/Path/Impact/Speed/Rhythm) to improve your putts.

 

5. Want to play, but can't make it to the course? Play a virtual round with your friends.

Putt on a virtual green with your friends. Utilize the digital green to get yourself used to putting on a green with varying elevations.    

 

How would it Improve my Putting?
column11:
>

 

unconscious muscle memory build

Golfers try hard to hit the ball squarely for it to stay on the proper line. But inconsistencies in the average golfer’s putting stroke makes this tough task even more difficult. With the Smart Putter, you allow the LED level indicator to help show you a level, consistent swing path . Utilize the laser aimer built onto the face of the putter to check for proper alignment . All of this is done by just looking at the head of the putter and maintaining a proper putting stance.
column12:
>

With the Smart Putter, you will be building and sustaining the right muscle memory for your putting. Naturally you will become a winner on the green with the Smart Putter.
column13: >How is it different?
column14:
>

1. No more wasting time setting things up

You have to acquire several equipment and different setups to improve your overall putting. However, with the SMART Putter your Targeting, Horizontal movement, and Stabilization is all taken care of with ONE SMART Putter. With just one putter, you can develop a develop and sustain a muscle memory that will get you that hole in one.                                                                                                     

2. With or Without the App

No app required

Unlike other golf simulators and analyzers that help with just one phase of your putting stroke, our Smart Putter provide an all-in-one putting solution.

column1:
3. Real-time animation

The avatar in our SMARTGOLF App does not display some random pre-made animation that only plays after you swing. The putter delivers real-time data to your App and with this live data, the App has the avatar move with it. The avatar will move and swing just as you are. This is recorded and you can play it back and forth to observe your form.   

 

 

An effective putter even with LED/Laser turned off

4. No more switching between your practice putter and game putter.

The grip and weight of your putter are major factors when it comes to building proper muscle memory. Don't lose your momentum by going back and forth from your practice putter to your game putter. With the Smart Putter, practice with the LED level indicator, laser aimer, and connection with application for analysis. After learning proper muscle memory formed with the Smart Putter, just turn off the technology and enjoy the Smart Putter as you would your usual putter.
column3:
>              

The SMARTGOLF App is currently available on App Store , Google Play Store, and Windows. The App is fully compatible with ios, android and Windows PC platforms.

VR is planned for SMARTGOLF App next year May. For the ultimate and the most realistic golf experience. Stay tuned for updates on VR SMARTGOLF

After connecting the SMART Putter to the App, watch as the avatar move according to your exact movement. Play the your recorded stroke back and forth for comparison. Utilize the analysis that the App provides. 

SMART PUTTER GALLERY
column8: >Why We Need Your Pledge
column9:
>

We are a growing startup company with the huge goal of making golf practice or even the sport itself more accessible and affordable. We are not asking you to back a project that is in the dark. The SMARTGOLF App is already running with our club from our previous Kickstarter campaign ('15). The mechanical and electrical design for the putter is complete with the prototype already built and ready. We are working on finalizing software development (precision) and full scale mass production. With Smart Putter being fully funded (183%) on Kickstarter, indiegogo backers would be receiving the Smart Putter for granted. With your support, we can bring the world's first digital putter that can give you all the information that other putting gadgets offered in a very reasonable price. We have already have set contracts with our manufacturing counterparts which means once we receive the funds it is just a matter of time before you get your Smart Putter on time.
column10:
>Our Story

 SMARTGOLF has marched for providing an effective an accessible golf practice method to golfers of every level since 2015. With two successful Crowdfunding Campaigns ( '15 Smartgolf Club Kickstarter, '17 Smart Putter Kickstarter) we have kept our word in fulfilling all delivery of rewards to our backers.  Therefore, we can safely say that we have experience and confidence in what we do. As we were continuing to develop more accessible and smart golf equipment, we have set our direction to inventing a putter that can give you the necessary training and perform as a gamer at the same time. We believe that when it comes to putting, your grip, weight, feel, and senses are all important. Which is why we worked day and night for months to invent and produce the Smart Putter which can lead you to a better putt but also perform and feel like your actual gamer. We have come a long way to make ""Smart Putter"" a real equipment from ideas. The only wall standing between you and the Smart Putter is this Kickstarter project. Let us break down that wall with a fantastic success on our project and get you the solution that you need!

A month ago, our five year old brother, Jonathon Bost-was diagnosed with Leukemia. He is doing very well but to keep his little body strong- the Doctors are keeping him on a rather expensive health regime. Every week, little Jon has to travel 400 miles to have his blood drawn at the Children's Hospital in Phoenix, AZ. We are doing everything we can to keep him strong. Every little bit helps.
Thank you and God Bless.

Brains Over Bullets

       A Robotic Solution to Gun Violence
A robot to actively protect students from the first gunshot
until police arrive.
The Genesis of Brains over Bullets:
“Every revolution was first a thought in one man's mind
when the same thought occurs to another man, it is the key to that
era.”

- Ralph Waldo Emerson, Essays: First Series,1841.

How often is tragedy the genesis of revolution? As unfortunate as
it is, quite often it takes the shock of tragedy to stimulate us to
action. And so it is the case here. In the aftermath of the Newtown
shootings, a group of engineers and engineering interns have come
together to investigate what can be done to protect our children
while at school. We believe there are non-lethal, non-violent ways to
defend our schools. That not through force, but technology, lies the

answer to securing our schools from the threat of violence. 


In the coming months, we plan to begin the design and fabrication
of an active robotic security system. This system will be designed to
monitor, confront and distract an intruder until the proper authorities can arrive to neutralize the situation. The technical challenges are numerous
successes will be few and far between. But like the engineers we are,
we will persevere and overcome these obstacles. We welcome you then,
you join us on this journey of intellect over violence. We are –
Brains over Bullets…
So we need YOUR help to make schools safer. Every donation, no
matter how small, leads us one step closer to making Brains over
Bullets a reality.
Project Phases:
Phase 1 - Develop mechanical / electronic mobile robot $60,000.00
- Develop 4 on-board deterrents - Baking soda powder spray -
Ping-pong ball shooter - Strobe lights - Sonic noise device - Remote
controlled by human operator
Phase 2 - Basic Autonomous (Navigation) Ability - $150,000.00 -
Scheme / Algorithm for deploying deterrents
Phase 3 - Advanced Autonomous Ability - $250,000.00 - Investigate
ability to detect gunshot and move towards it - Investigate ability
to lock-on to target and maintain contact

Phase 4 – Field Trials - $300,000.00

                                         Brains
over Bullets T-Shirt
For Those of You Who Love the Details:
Phase 1 – In this phase, we will design and build the basic
mechanical / electronic components of the robot. Things like the
frame, wheels, motors, controllers, batteries, etc. We will leverage
this design from our past work on small mobile robots. The heart of
phase 1 will be the design and fabrication of the deterrents. We want
to have 4 of these deterrents installed and operational on the robot.
For this phase, we intend the robot to be operated via human
remote-control only. The final goal being a working prototype,
remote-controlled, and having 4 onboard deterrents controlled via the
remote-control unit.
Phase 2 – We’ll add the ‘smarts’ to the robot during this
phase – in short, we’ll give him a brain. He’ll then have the
basic ability to wander around remotely and not run into anything or
anybody. The software for this sort of navigation is widely
available. We will research a number of these systems and pick the
best one suited to our application. We’ll add some sensors so he
can detect obstacles – and tell the difference between a post and a
person. Simultaneously, we’ll be working on a scheme for employing
the deterrents once we are in ‘super hero’ mode. It might be an
approach where the deterrents follow some random pattern, or we might
find that a scheduled approach is more effective. The final goal
being the ability to get from Point A to Point B without hitting
anything – then engaging the four deterrents in some determined
fashion.
Phase 3 – Even though our robot is smart – he’ll need to be
smarter. Here is where the hardware and software need to start having
serious discussions with one another. We’ll need sensors that can
detect a gunshot, and software smart enough to determine the location
and direct the robot towards the threat. Once there, we’ll need the
ability to lock on to the target and deliver the deterrents. If the
intruder runs, the robot needs to monitor his movements and follow in
his wake. Again, the ultimate intent is to buy time – if all we end
up doing is chasing the intruder around the school – then that is
time they aren’t targeting our kids.
Phase 4 – Here’s where we’ll bring it all together. Or maybe
a better way to describe it is this is where the rubber meets the
road. Once we have a working prototype, we need to head out into the
Real World for field testing. Good ideas are only good ideas if they
work. We’ll need to secure a suitable location, or locations, and
run the robot through a series of scenarios to see how it responds.
There will be failures, improvements, more failures and more
improvements – this is the nature of testing. Our ultimate goal
will be a full-up working system which meets our original design
criteria – that criteria being to simply ‘buy time’. Time for
our kids, time for our teachers and time for our police.
column4:
/>

RoPro's six wheeled rover - designed for NASA / Carnegie Mellon University


Safety Features:

column1: Human Operator Override Feature
Despite that movies love to portray the out-of-control robot
running around hurting people, in real life, robots rarely go
berserk. And when they do, they typically just run down over the hill
into the woods. However, we most definitely will install a human
override function that is accessible to whoever is granted access to
robot’s operation. There are actually a number of different
techniques that could be employed that would keep the robot from
confronting those it is not programmed to confront. But we aren’t
going to discuss those here as that would be giving away our secrets
to the bad guys.
Non-harmful deterrents
When we talked with people about this project during our initial
investigation, their first concern was about the robot potentially
harming the very children it is intended to protect. We want to make
it clear that our intent isn’t to maim, harm or injure an intruder,
our intent is to deter, confuse and distract them. To force him/her
to deal with the robot and thus either slow or stop them from
carrying out their original intention. Ultimately we are trying to
buy time, time for the kids and teachers to get behind locked doors –

time for the good guys to arrive and stop the assailant.

Risks and Challenges:
We will need thick skin as many people are going to be eager to
tell us all the reasons this isn’t going to work. We aren’t
saying this is going to be easy, all we will say is that we’ll give
it the best chance of success that we can muster.
Multi-floored schools: Though most modern suburban schools are
constructed across a single level, many older urban schools still
have multi-floor lay-outs. Building a robot to climb stairs is an
entire KickStarter project in itself. Multiple stationed robots will
be a better solution here. These robots will need to talk with one
another so if the intruder escapes to another floor, that information
can be relayed to those robots on the floors above and below. So
beside B.o.B, you might need a few B.a.r.B’s and T.o.M’s.
Single gunshot: In the event an intruder has an individual target
in mind, he/she may only fire one or two shots. This may not give the
robot enough time to locate the source of the gun fire. An option
here is to give the person monitoring the school’s security camera
system, the ability to manually direct the robot’s movement. This
might be nothing more than mousing over the suspect in question on
the video screen and clicking the “go get ‘em’ button. This
information is then relayed to the robot who will do its best to
locate the intruder.

column2: >Robot itself is targeted: Of course, this is the one that everyone

column1: will point out. What happens if the intruder turns the gun on the
robot? Our response to that is - GREAT! If they are shooting robots,
then they won’t be shooting kids. Important electronics can be
hardened from attack, tires can be solid rubber. We’ll make sure
that the robot can take some serious damage and continue on its
mission. Remember, he doesn’t need to survive for an hour
needs to survive the time gap until the police arrive.
column2:
>

RoPro's Robotized John Deere Utility Vehicle

Knife instead of a gun: We’ve assumed up to this point that the

column1: intruder is armed with a gun – but what happens if it is a knife or
baseball bat instead? Again, like the ‘too few shots’ scenario
from above, the robot could be manually directed to the target from
the person monitoring the security cameras.
We are sure there are many more challenges and limitations before
us
column2: some that we won’t discover until testing. Many of you will

column1: point out ones we haven’t thought of – great - we welcome your
input. Our goal here is to save lives, not show you how smart we
think we are. But standing around and talking about the many reasons
this won’t work, will never solve the problem. Hard work, long
hours and working capital is what this project calls for. So jump on
the band wagon with us here and be part of the solution!
About RoPro Design:
RoPro Design – incorporated in 2003, our company’s core focus
is the design and fabrication of mechanical prototypes for the mobile
robotics industry as well as other high technology research and
development markets. In addition to this core focus, we also aspire
to be a ‘Teaching Hospital for Young Engineers’. Of all we do, we
consider this our highest calling and a critical part of our Mission
Statement.
column2: >RoPro's Demining Robots - designed for Army / Carniegie Mellon University
column3: >After not being able to find the engineering talent we needed, we

column1: decided in 2004 to grow this talent internally. We sifted through the
local high schools for ‘good clay’, then offered internships to
the aspiring engineers we found there. Rather than teaching
engineering from the classroom, we teach it from the shop floor. If
you can’t fabricate, how can you possibly expect to design? So we
quickly immerse the interns into our shop’s fabrication process.
Through fabrication, they slowly begin to get a sense of scale, of
the ‘feel’ of materials, of best design practices. Armed with
this strong sense of fabrication and design then, their high school
and college engineering classes begin to take on more meaning –
rather than being empty exercises with no practical application.
column2:
>Throwing out the first pitch at PNC park

This immersion style of teaching is needed now more than ever, as

column1: kids simply don’t get the exposure to mechanical systems as the
previous generation. I’m my era
column2: all our Dads changed the oil in

column1: their cars and did the majority of household repairs themselves. We
all built tree houses and go-carts from scratch. We knew how a
bicycle worked and how to fix it when it didn’t. When the car quit
running, there wasn’t a cell phone lying on the seat to call AAA.
We’ve lost this sense of mechanical resourcefulness, and you can
see it clearly reflected in the poorly designed products that infest
the market place today. Regardless of the continued proliferation of
software and electronic gadgets, we are 3-dimensional creatures that
inhabit a 3-dimensional world. We interact with this world through
mechanical devices and tools. In our own small way then, we are
fighting back against this increasing lack of mechanical knowledge
one intern at a time. If our company achieves nothing more than
turning out solid engineers, grounded in the principles of practical
engineering, we will ultimately deem our work at RoPro Design a

rousing success.


RoPro's Chemical Sensor Package - designed for Applied Perception Inc.

Visit The RoPro Design's site to see more of our exciting projects.

http://www.roprodesign.com/

About RoPro Design's Founder:
Ray Russell – a 1981 graduate of Penn State University, Ray
holds a B.S. in Aerospace Engineering. After graduation, he spent 20
years in the aerospace industry, working for numerous aircraft
companies including General Dynamics, Saab Aircraft, The Boeing
Company and Lockheed-Martin. In recent years, he has turned his
engineering and design talents towards the mobile robotics industry.
Prior to forming RoPro Design in 2003, he had worked as a consultant
in the robotics field for the Carnegie Science Center, Probotics and
the National Robotics Engineering Consortium. For the past 12 years,
he has owned and operated RoPro Design, an energetic company
specializing in the design and fabrication of prototypes for the

mobile robotics market.

                                                            Ray Russell

era.”
- Ralph Waldo Emerson, Essays: First Series,1841.How often is tragedy the genesis of revolution? As unfortunate as
it is, quite often it takes the shock of tragedy to stimulate us to
action. And so it is the case here. In the aftermath of the Newtown
shootings, a group of engineers and engineering interns have come
together to investigate what can be done to protect our children
while at school. We believe there are non-lethal, non-violent ways to
defend our schools. That not through force, but technology, lies the
answer to securing our schools from the threat of violence.  In the coming months, we plan to begin the design and fabrication
of an active robotic security system. This system will be designed to
monitor, confront and distract an intruder until the proper authorities can arrive to neutralize the situation. The technical challenges are numerous
successes will be few and far between. But like the engineers we are,
we will persevere and overcome these obstacles. We welcome you then,
you join us on this journey of intellect over violence. We are –
Brains over Bullets…
So we need YOUR help to make schools safer. Every donation, no
matter how small, leads us one step closer to making Brains over
Bullets a reality.
Project Phases:
Phase 1 - Develop mechanical / electronic mobile robot $60,000.00
- Develop 4 on-board deterrents - Baking soda powder spray -
Ping-pong ball shooter - Strobe lights - Sonic noise device - Remote
controlled by human operator
Phase 2 - Basic Autonomous (Navigation) Ability - $150,000.00 -
Scheme / Algorithm for deploying deterrents
Phase 3 - Advanced Autonomous Ability - $250,000.00 - Investigate
ability to detect gunshot and move towards it - Investigate ability
to lock-on to target and maintain contact
Phase 4 – Field Trials - $300,000.00                                          Brains
over Bullets T-Shirt
For Those of You Who Love the Details:
Phase 1 – In this phase, we will design and build the basic
mechanical / electronic components of the robot. Things like the
frame, wheels, motors, controllers, batteries, etc. We will leverage
this design from our past work on small mobile robots. The heart of
phase 1 will be the design and fabrication of the deterrents. We want
to have 4 of these deterrents installed and operational on the robot.
For this phase, we intend the robot to be operated via human
remote-control only. The final goal being a working prototype,
remote-controlled, and having 4 onboard deterrents controlled via the
remote-control unit.
Phase 2 – We’ll add the ‘smarts’ to the robot during this
phase – in short, we’ll give him a brain. He’ll then have the
basic ability to wander around remotely and not run into anything or
anybody. The software for this sort of navigation is widely
available. We will research a number of these systems and pick the
best one suited to our application. We’ll add some sensors so he
can detect obstacles – and tell the difference between a post and a
person. Simultaneously, we’ll be working on a scheme for employing
the deterrents once we are in ‘super hero’ mode. It might be an
approach where the deterrents follow some random pattern, or we might
find that a scheduled approach is more effective. The final goal
being the ability to get from Point A to Point B without hitting
anything – then engaging the four deterrents in some determined
fashion.
Phase 3 – Even though our robot is smart – he’ll need to be
smarter. Here is where the hardware and software need to start having
serious discussions with one another. We’ll need sensors that can
detect a gunshot, and software smart enough to determine the location
and direct the robot towards the threat. Once there, we’ll need the
ability to lock on to the target and deliver the deterrents. If the
intruder runs, the robot needs to monitor his movements and follow in
his wake. Again, the ultimate intent is to buy time – if all we end
up doing is chasing the intruder around the school – then that is
time they aren’t targeting our kids.
Phase 4 – Here’s where we’ll bring it all together. Or maybe
a better way to describe it is this is where the rubber meets the
road. Once we have a working prototype, we need to head out into the
Real World for field testing. Good ideas are only good ideas if they
work. We’ll need to secure a suitable location, or locations, and
run the robot through a series of scenarios to see how it responds.
There will be failures, improvements, more failures and more
improvements – this is the nature of testing. Our ultimate goal
will be a full-up working system which meets our original design
criteria – that criteria being to simply ‘buy time’. Time for
our kids, time for our teachers and time for our police. RoPro's six wheeled rover - designed for NASA / Carnegie Mellon UniversitySafety Features:
Human Operator Override Feature
Despite that movies love to portray the out-of-control robot
running around hurting people, in real life, robots rarely go
berserk. And when they do, they typically just run down over the hill
into the woods. However, we most definitely will install a human
override function that is accessible to whoever is granted access to
robot’s operation. There are actually a number of different
techniques that could be employed that would keep the robot from
confronting those it is not programmed to confront. But we aren’t
going to discuss those here as that would be giving away our secrets
to the bad guys.
Non-harmful deterrents
When we talked with people about this project during our initial
investigation, their first concern was about the robot potentially
harming the very children it is intended to protect. We want to make
it clear that our intent isn’t to maim, harm or injure an intruder,
our intent is to deter, confuse and distract them. To force him/her
to deal with the robot and thus either slow or stop them from
carrying out their original intention. Ultimately we are trying to
buy time, time for the kids and teachers to get behind locked doors –
time for the good guys to arrive and stop the assailant. Risks and Challenges:
We will need thick skin as many people are going to be eager to
tell us all the reasons this isn’t going to work. We aren’t
saying this is going to be easy, all we will say is that we’ll give
it the best chance of success that we can muster.
Multi-floored schools: Though most modern suburban schools are
constructed across a single level, many older urban schools still
have multi-floor lay-outs. Building a robot to climb stairs is an
entire KickStarter project in itself. Multiple stationed robots will
be a better solution here. These robots will need to talk with one
another so if the intruder escapes to another floor, that information
can be relayed to those robots on the floors above and below. So
beside B.o.B, you might need a few B.a.r.B’s and T.o.M’s.
Single gunshot: In the event an intruder has an individual target
in mind, he/she may only fire one or two shots. This may not give the
robot enough time to locate the source of the gun fire. An option
here is to give the person monitoring the school’s security camera
system, the ability to manually direct the robot’s movement. This
might be nothing more than mousing over the suspect in question on
the video screen and clicking the “go get ‘em’ button. This
information is then relayed to the robot who will do its best to
locate the intruder.
Robot itself is targeted: Of course, this is the one that everyone
will point out. What happens if the intruder turns the gun on the
robot? Our response to that is - GREAT! If they are shooting robots,
then they won’t be shooting kids. Important electronics can be
hardened from attack, tires can be solid rubber. We’ll make sure
that the robot can take some serious damage and continue on its
mission. Remember, he doesn’t need to survive for an hour
needs to survive the time gap until the police arrive. RoPro's Robotized John Deere Utility VehicleKnife instead of a gun: We’ve assumed up to this point that the
intruder is armed with a gun – but what happens if it is a knife or
baseball bat instead? Again, like the ‘too few shots’ scenario
from above, the robot could be manually directed to the target from
the person monitoring the security cameras.
We are sure there are many more challenges and limitations before
us
column2: some that we won’t discover until testing. Many of you will

column1: point out ones we haven’t thought of – great - we welcome your
input. Our goal here is to save lives, not show you how smart we
think we are. But standing around and talking about the many reasons
this won’t work, will never solve the problem. Hard work, long
hours and working capital is what this project calls for. So jump on
the band wagon with us here and be part of the solution!
About RoPro Design:
RoPro Design – incorporated in 2003, our company’s core focus
is the design and fabrication of mechanical prototypes for the mobile
robotics industry as well as other high technology research and
development markets. In addition to this core focus, we also aspire
to be a ‘Teaching Hospital for Young Engineers’. Of all we do, we
consider this our highest calling and a critical part of our Mission
Statement.  RoPro's Demining Robots - designed for Army / Carniegie Mellon UniversityAfter not being able to find the engineering talent we needed, we
decided in 2004 to grow this talent internally. We sifted through the
local high schools for ‘good clay’, then offered internships to
the aspiring engineers we found there. Rather than teaching
engineering from the classroom, we teach it from the shop floor. If
you can’t fabricate, how can you possibly expect to design? So we
quickly immerse the interns into our shop’s fabrication process.
Through fabrication, they slowly begin to get a sense of scale, of
the ‘feel’ of materials, of best design practices. Armed with
this strong sense of fabrication and design then, their high school
and college engineering classes begin to take on more meaning –
rather than being empty exercises with no practical application. Throwing out the first pitch at PNC parkThis immersion style of teaching is needed now more than ever, as
kids simply don’t get the exposure to mechanical systems as the
previous generation. I’m my era
column2: all our Dads changed the oil in

column1: their cars and did the majority of household repairs themselves. We
all built tree houses and go-carts from scratch. We knew how a
bicycle worked and how to fix it when it didn’t. When the car quit
running, there wasn’t a cell phone lying on the seat to call AAA.
We’ve lost this sense of mechanical resourcefulness, and you can
see it clearly reflected in the poorly designed products that infest
the market place today. Regardless of the continued proliferation of
software and electronic gadgets, we are 3-dimensional creatures that
inhabit a 3-dimensional world. We interact with this world through
mechanical devices and tools. In our own small way then, we are
fighting back against this increasing lack of mechanical knowledge
one intern at a time. If our company achieves nothing more than
turning out solid engineers, grounded in the principles of practical
engineering, we will ultimately deem our work at RoPro Design a
rousing success.RoPro's Chemical Sensor Package - designed for Applied Perception Inc.Visit The RoPro Design's site to see more of our exciting projects.

http://www.roprodesign.com/Justine Coyne's article on the BoB project.http://www.bizjournals.com/pittsburgh/blog/innovation/2013/12/brains-over-bullets-want-to-use-bots.html?page=allThe Stop Gun Violence NOW Theater Festival Link
http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-stop-gun-violence-now-theater-festival/x/5621230About RoPro Design's Founder:
Ray Russell – a 1981 graduate of Penn State University, Ray
holds a B.S. in Aerospace Engineering. After graduation, he spent 20
years in the aerospace industry, working for numerous aircraft
companies including General Dynamics, Saab Aircraft, The Boeing
Company and Lockheed-Martin. In recent years, he has turned his
engineering and design talents towards the mobile robotics industry.
Prior to forming RoPro Design in 2003, he had worked as a consultant
in the robotics field for the Carnegie Science Center, Probotics and
the National Robotics Engineering Consortium. For the past 12 years,
he has owned and operated RoPro Design, an energetic company
specializing in the design and fabrication of prototypes for the
mobile robotics market.                                                            Ray Russell",8.0,0,"1 Campaign

Ishbel Dickens will celebrate her 60th Birthday by running
the Seattle half marathon on December 1, 2013 to raise money for NMHOA.
All of the money raised will go to the National Manufactured
Home Owners Association (NMHOA), a nonprofit dedicated to promoting, representing,
preserving, and enhancing the rights and interests of manufactured home-owners
throughout the United States.
Ishbel is the Executive Director of the NMHOA, and her work

goes to support people who own their homes but who rent the land under them and live in manufactured housing communities/mobile home parks. Many of these home owners' economic security is threatened by ever-increasing land
rents and subpar maintenance of the manufactured home communities, which in
some cases have resulted in injury and death.
Retirees living on a fixed income often are forced out of their own homes

when they can no longer afford skyrocketing land rent increases. As a result, these seniors lose all of their equity in their homes and have no investment return to allow them to move into assisted living or to pass along to their heirs.
Why the National
Manufactured Home Owners Association (NMHOA) exists:
·
17 million people, in the United States, live in
manufactured/mobile homes.
·
There are approximately 6.8 million manufactured/mobile
homes in the U.S and 2.9 million of them (43%) are situated in land lease
(privately owned) communities.
·
In many states manufactured homes are still
considered “chattel” and therefore people purchasing manufactured homes do not
qualify for the standard financing/loan products or other consumer protections
that people purchasing stick built homes have available to them.
·
While most states have statutes that govern the
relationship between community owners and home owners, many of these laws are
weak, not enforceable, and not drafted in such a way as to provide security of
tenure for manufactured home owners.
·
Manufactured housing provides unsubsidized
affordable homeownership opportunities for millions of seniors and young
families, yet there are very few protections in place to guarantee the long
term preservation of manufactured housing communities.
·
Some manufactured housing community owners deny
their residents the right to form home owners’ associations, the right to
inform their neighbors of their rights under state law, and in other ways
restrict their constitutional rights.

TROPICALCLINICS STORY:

We need your help to deliver a container of urgently needed medicine, medical supplies and nutrients to our clinic in rural Kenya. Kenya’s rural healthcare resources are overwhelmed! TropicalClinics is helping out!!

Personal suffering is multiplied by difficult access to care, AIDS, and the lack of
preventive medicines. Fungal infections leading to cervical cancer – is now the
number one killer of women in Kenya. Nearly 40% of children in rural areas are killed by preventable malnutrition before they reach the age of 5.

TropicalClinics is delivering eye equipment to help restore eye sight
column2:
dental theatre to
provide much needed oral care, preventive screening tools to reduce the ravage effects of cervical cancer in women, and nutrients to help children live longer than 5 years old. We will continue to provide easy access to quality medical care until everyone in our rural region is served. Your donation to this campaign is helping us REACH THIS TARGET! 

TropicalClinics leads a steadfast role to establishing a medical center that guarantee quality standards in rural community health. For more info, go to our website at www.tropicalclinics.org. Do something amazing and help us provide the healthcare a woman, a child, and their families need to survive and thrive!! Donations are tax-deductible. Thank you!!!!!!!

We are especially interested in helping women because their health is tied to the well-being of their family and community. Make a contribution today so that those with debilitating diseases and disabled bodies in rural Kenya can know the miracle of good health.

Help us get the word out about our campaign. Share with friends, co-workers, family, others interested in saving lives. We are grateful to your support!!

LogicMaxx Sterilization Cleaner uses salt and tap water as raw materials, through the process of electrode electrolysis, it can automatically generate efficient, broad-spectrum, safe, non-toxic and side effect disinfection and sterilization liquid, which portable, quick disinfection and 99% sterilization.

Cleaning more economically, friendly, and safe. Killing 99% of bacteria and viruses, ensuring health and safety in daily life.

 

 

 

 

Viruses and bacteria are everywhere, Besides washing your hands, you can...

 

 

LogicMaxx Sterilization Cleaner can sterilize 99% Viruses and bacteria,  even coronavirus.

 

Certified by the authority, it can quickly eliminate bacteria such as Escherichia coil, streptococcus aureus, aspergillus Niger, salmonella Typhimurium, candida Africans, and has no side effects on human beings and animals.

 

 

 

 

The contactless hand disinfection system with an automatic sensor enables quick and easy hand disinfection and prevents cross-contamination.

Reach out your hand close to the sensing position, automatically sense the disinfection water mist, turn your hand to the front and back, and conduct the disinfection and killing of water mist Bacteria treatment, Your hand can be washed with tap water.

 

Wall rack can be hung everywhere.

 

When electrified, water and salt can produce living oxygen and numerous free radicals(including hydrochloride and hydroxide ions) through electrode electrolysis, which can generate wash free disinfectant for environmental protection disinfection and sterilization.

 

Wash free safety and environmental protection. It can effectively kill active coronavirus and bacteria.
• 1. Add tap water to the bottle and 1 tablespoon of salt, about 0. 5g of salt (recommended)
• 2. Press the button for two seconds to turn on. (red, blue and green light ring flashing)
• 3. Lightly press the button to turn the general cleaning mode electrolysis(blue light up). Press twice button to turn the powerful disinfection mode electrolysis(green light up).
• 4. When the function ends after the light goes out, the buzzer rings, and the disinfectant water is generated.
You can use it with confidence in your home, restaurant, hospital,  beauty salon, school, etc. The main material is ABS environmental protection grade material, which is safer to use.

Do You Relate to Fitness?

So you’ve been wanting to start a fitness program, but everywhere you look you see programs that reinforce heteronormative, patriarchal, gender binaristic standards. You may be thinking, “Where’s all the good stuff? Why can’t I find a fitness community that affirms ME?!”

I understand, because I’ve been there.

My name is Pat. I am a queer transmasculine boxer, fitness trainer, and speaker. I wanted to change my body to reflect my masculine identity, so I threw myself into competitive boxing and strength training. 10 years later, I was still the only queer in the gym. I knew I wasn’t alone, but I didn’t see any high quality programs that acknowledged gender diversity. So, I decided to create my own.

And Buff Butch was born.

Buff Butch is a first-of-its-kind online personal fitness training resource created for queer and gender nonconforming people. We are an affirming community dedicated to bringing educational access to those who feel left out by the mainstream fitness industry.

You shouldn’t be denied access to fitness just because of who you are.

This is why I’m creating an online video course to be released this fall featuring only queer bodies, catered to nonconforming trainees. My aim is to educate, rather than dictate, how you should look or feel. I want you to have the tools to make your own informed decisions about your body.


Introducing:

""Reclaiming My Strength"" Fitness Program

Reclaiming My Strength, or RMS, is a beginner strength training program to reacquaint you with your body and help you reawaken your inherent strength. This program is helping to fund our core project: to queer the s*** out of the fitness industry through the Buff Butch online community and our speaking engagements. 

  • No more confusion. The RMS Program will lead you through 12 weeks of comprehensive strength training.
• No more one-size-fits-all. Each training session is flexible according to your current level of fitness with an emphasis on performance rather than aesthetics. (More details on this coming soon!)
• No more worrying if you’re doing things incorrectly. All training sessions will have videos and written instructions on how to properly perform each movement.

No more being told what you can or cannot do based on your gender. You define your own capabilities through practice, not society’s stereotypes.


Added Bonuses:
• You won’t have to listen to a trainer who doesn’t know the difference between sex and gender!
• You will be armed with the correct knowledge to combat bro science in the gym!
• The only bodies you’ll be seeing are hot queer bodies! (Jk...kind of)

This isn’t just about one training program. It is our aim to help all members of the community, regardless of location. This is why we’re bringing our gym online and on the road.

We’re launching a brand new website in the fall of 2014 featuring exclusive free content as well as video courses and personalized training subscriptions. In addition, Buff Butch is planning to attend multiple conferences to facilitate educational workshops, including gender sensitivity trainings for fitness professionals.
column2:
>You deserve to achieve your full physical potential. Help us to dismantle the barriers imposed on us by the fitness industry. Help us to create a stronger queer community!


Help Me, Help You

In order for us to provide all the free content in addition to this ground-breaking program, we need a little help. You are a key part of us meeting our financial goals. Here are our following costs:

  • Website startup: $2,400

column1: • Video production: $4,600
<li>Administrative tasks &amp

column4:
>In addition, we are offering first dibs on the RMS Program because
WE APPRECIATE YOU.
column7: >And because we appreciate you so much , we are offering it at a discounted rate. It will retail on our new website for $99, but for you special people, it will be $69 (Why $69? Because we both benefit that way! Plus, I'm immature :P)
column10:
>

    Are You In?

    As a five-time national champion, I know how to fight for what’s important. When I was the only out, queer boxer at the first Women’s USA Olympic Boxing Trials, I made it there despite physical and financial setbacks. I am bringing that same determination and passion to this project. I guarantee I will finish it.

    The reason for having this pre-sale is to expedite the construction and execution of the Buff Butch project.

    Because, haven’t you waited long enough?
column16:
>""Self Care Changes to Community Care""

Recently I presented at Philly Trans* Health Conference and I was fortunate enough to hear Janet Mock speak. What stuck the most with me was her comment about self care being bigger than the individual. She shared the story of how, as a teenager, an older trans girl helped her with her medical transition. 

Just as Janet Mock's friend used her privilege to help her on her journey, I am using my privileges as an athlete and trainer to help you. However, this is a two-way street, buddy. I need your help, too.

The RMS Program will lead you through 12 weeks of comprehensive strength training.
No more one-size-fits-all. Each training session is flexible according to your current level of fitness with an emphasis on performance rather than aesthetics. (More details on this coming soon!)
No more worrying if you’re doing things incorrectly. All training sessions will have videos and written instructions on how to properly perform each movement.
No more being told what you can or cannot do based on your gender. You define your own capabilities through practice, not society’s stereotypes.Added Bonuses:
You won’t have to listen to a trainer who doesn’t know the difference between sex and gender!
You will be armed with the correct knowledge to combat bro science in the gym!
The only bodies you’ll be seeing are hot queer bodies! (Jk...kind of)

This isn’t just about one training program. It is our aim to help all members of the community, regardless of location. This is why we’re bringing our gym online and on the road.We’re launching a brand new website in the fall of 2014 featuring exclusive free content as well as video courses and personalized training subscriptions. In addition, Buff Butch is planning to attend multiple conferences to facilitate educational workshops, including gender sensitivity trainings for fitness professionals.You deserve to achieve your full physical potential. Help us to dismantle the barriers imposed on us by the fitness industry. Help us to create a stronger queer community!  Help Me, Help YouIn order for us to provide all the free content in addition to this ground-breaking program, we need a little help. You are a key part of us meeting our financial goals. Here are our following costs:Website startup: $2,400
Video production: $4,600
Administrative tasks & legal registration: $3,000

In addition, we are offering first dibs on the RMS Program becauseWE APPRECIATE YOU.And because we appreciate you so much , we are offering it at a discounted rate. It will retail on our new website for $99, but for you special people, it will be $69 (Why $69? Because we both benefit that way! Plus, I'm immature :P)   Are You In?As a five-time national champion, I know how to fight for what’s important. When I was the only out, queer boxer at the first Women’s USA Olympic Boxing Trials, I made it there despite physical and financial setbacks. I am bringing that same determination and passion to this project. I guarantee I will finish it.The reason for having this pre-sale is to expedite the construction and execution of the Buff Butch project.Because, haven’t you waited long enough? ""Self Care Changes to Community Care""Recently I presented at Philly Trans* Health Conference and I was fortunate enough to hear Janet Mock speak. What stuck the most with me was her comment about self care being bigger than the individual. She shared the story of how, as a teenager, an older trans girl helped her with her medical transition. Just as Janet Mock's friend used her privilege to help her on her journey, I am using my privileges as an athlete and trainer to help you. However, this is a two-way street, buddy. I need your help, too.To-Do List:
Please donate: Pick a Perk!
PLEASE SHARE this page with your network!
Join our mailing list  here!
Follow Buff Butch's Twitter and Facebook pages!
Don't wait! I know you're online right now, so let's go!",0.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Los Angeles, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/hidden--2/pica

The Story of Dr Gaye Super-Shake
As a food
futurologist I have spent decades of my time working with global brands, helping
them to understand the future of food and trends.
I have been
making my Super-Shake since 2002 when I really began to explore and research
bio-availability, wellness and how we medicate ourselves each day with what we eat.
It was just
for friends and family, but then I started noticing they were having health
breakthroughs, so I started to make a bit more of it and the word spread.
I’d like to
say the rest is history, but it’s been an ongoing journey, which is making a
difference to people’s lives and wellbeing.
Our Super Products
<div>
We now have
a range of 4 products:
1.  Dr Gaye Super-Shake:
·
Full
daily requirement of vitamins, minerals and micronutrients
·
raw, gluten free, grain free, dairy free, sugar free, nut free and vegetarian
·
All
ingredients are organic
·
Just
add water and blend
2.  Dr Gaye Super-Porridge:
·
Instant
oat-free porridge
·
raw, gluten free, grain free, dairy free, sugar free and vegan
·
All
ingredients are organic
·
A
filling bowlful of nourishment
3.  Dr Gaye Super-Blend:
·
Stirs
into any food (from yoghurt to juice to smoothies)
·
raw, gluten free, grain free, dairy free, sugar free and vegan
·
All
ingredients are organic
·
14
bio-available ingredients
4.
Dr Gaye Super-Spoonful:
·
Can
be eaten out of the bag or on the go
·
raw, gluten free, grain free, dairy free, sugar free, nut free and vegan
·
All
ingredients are organic
·
Natural
re-mineralising energy boost
We are currently a very small team and we love what we do, because we believe that we offer the highest quality nutrition available for busy people who want to feel even more super!
Even with
our limited budget and resources, sales have been increasing and demand continues
to grow, however we do not have the capability to manufacture larger quantities
of the products. At the moment, we are making the products by hand
labelling the bags and weighing all the ingredients (to the nearest gram).
There’s only so long we can keep this up as sales increase!
We’d love to
be able grow this business, so we can reach more people and meet demand. We
would like to:
*  Buy
ingredients in larger bulk quantities thereby reducing the cost of the products
*  Outsource
production to a specialist manufacturer
*  Update
our website
*  Use
marketing and PR to promote the products
*  Fund
the certification of a number of accredited bodies (i.e. The Soil Association, The Vegetarian Society etc.)
We’d love
your support to help us to keep our integrity, produce more and to continue making
a real difference to people’s health.
Perks
<div>
As you can see, all of our SUPER perks are listed on the right hand side.
Delivery is inclusive in all prices for both worldwide and UK perks. The prices vary depending on whether it is dispatched local or worldwide.
We aim to deliver your reward as soon as physically possible, however if demand is high we may not be able to dispatch until our new production run, which will be the end of November at the latest.
As with any
small business, Dr Gaye Super-Shake faces challenges big and small. Our
exponential growth continues to stretch our resources and production/staff
capacities – and this always keeps us on our toes.
Spread the Word
If you're
not able to make a financial contribution, spread the word! And connect with us
to show your support – we’ll be your friend for life!
<ul>
<li>Use the
Indiegogo share tools to share this campaign with your social networks
<li>Connect
with Dr Gaye Super-Shake on:
-
Facebook (Dr Gaye Super-Shake)
-
Twitter (@Super_Shake)
-
Instagram (@Drgayesuper)

Pinterest (Dr Gaye Super-Shake)

My Story: 

In January of 2014 I was removed from my home, and forced to head back to my parents place from Maryland, to Missouri. Shortly after as if being shook up wasn't bad enough I was sent to the hospital with a severe back pain and at 26...I was diagnosed with degenerative disc disease, sciatica, and was told that my SI joint was severely damaged. From all this...I need surgery. Which I can't afford and my insurance will hardly pay. I was told that I wasn't able to go back to work, and I am fighting to get disability with no luck...and my family can't help out more than they already do...

I wish that my story stopped there but it gets worse. In July of 2014 I was hospitalized again, and had a strange stutter. Turns out that I had two mini strokes, my body was shutting down, and I still can't fully talk right...because of this I lost the ability to work a desk job...so with my back out of wack, and my head messing with me...I have been lost. My story however still doesn't end there...though I wish that it did...

In September My heart rate was over 200bpm, and I found out that my heart as a flaw in the electrical currents that are inside of it. I had to undergo so many tests to figure out what was wrong...it has now been decided that I need a simple procedure, but once again...my insurance can't pay much leaving me with medical expenses I can't pay. 

When it rains it pours. I lost my home, my job, my car...basically everything. I'm lost, confused, and barely getting by...I need to get my health sorted out so that I am able to get a job, and start my life up again. I'm only 26...my birthday to turn 27 in a few days. 

Friday October 3rd...the results came in that I have rheumatoid arthritis...and I'm not even in my 30's. These are conditions that I shouldn't even be facing, and I can't seem to get any help. So I am asking. Even just a small donation will help me. I have got to get back on my feet. These bills are piling up...and I can't handle it. The stress only making my health worse. 

So please...if you're still reading this...can you please help me fix my life back up. I'm so lost, and I hate drifting between places to live...and barely eating. I can't even afford the medication I need...

If you help me, I will be eternally thankful...and I really am all out of options...so please..and if you do...thank you. If you can't donate...please get my story out. I could really use a rainbow after this storm hit my life, and spun me upside down. 

Even if I don't get the full amount...every penny counts...

Thank you for your time reading this...I appreciate even the thought.
